<div>

EASI fills the gap in the market between the International providers of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and Customer Relationship Management (CRM), and many smaller providers who rely on third party solutions. Customers therefore can expect to invest a lot less yet are able to fulfill their growing requirements.

Historically EASI has been one of the leading Point of Sale (POS) provider in Singapore, Malaysia and Papua New Guinea, with presence in Hongkong and Indonesia. Its clients range from one shop operators to international brands with hundreds of outlets. EASI has a long track record in catering to a wide range of retailers, big and small, f&b operators and pharmacies. EASI fully developed its own applications, customizations and It has its own development team to support and create new products to keep advancing its clients' systems and infrastructure With easy to use, easy to implement and rollout apps, EASI will reduce your implementation and training time.

column1: <div>
Our Background
<div>
<div>

EASI, Enterprise Advanced System Intelligence Pte Ltd, is founded in 2002, by a group of professionals who are passionate in providing One – stop service oriented IT solutions to the Changing POS industry. We focus to help multidisciplinary businesses make decisive improvements in client’s directions and performance by sparkling breakthrough ideas for clients, the business world, and society. We seek to inspire enterprising and imaginative people – at our clients and on our staff – with unparalleled opportunities for professional and personal growth. In this way, we hope to forge lifelong bonds with them.

Enterprise Advanced System Intelligence Pte Ltd is a subsidiary of PPB Group Berhad profile. PPB Group Berhad was incorporated in Malaysia in November 1968 and was subsequently listed on the then Stock Exchange of Kuala Lumpur and Singapore with an issued and paid capital of RM15million in May 1972.The Company has grown from its initial business of cane cultivation and sugar milling to become a major conglomerate engaged in diverse businesses. The Group’s operations now include sugar refining; grains trading, flour and feed milling; edible oils processing; oil palm plantations; environmental engineering and waste management; film exhibition and distribution; property ownership and development; and commodity trading.

·        Great teamwork spirit yet have the ability to work individually when required.

2,software,/en/job/software-qa-engineer-9409290,9409290,Software QA Engineer,False,False,4200,5880,SGD,SESTO Robotics Pte Ltd,6 hours ago,False,,23 days,201700849N,,,1 - 50 Employees,,,"

SESTO Robotics is a leading robotics company in the field of autonomous technology that aims to advance the adoption of smart manufacturing processes. Headquartered in Singapore, the company engineers and delivers robotics solutions to global clients seeking to empower their businesses with greater efficiency. SESTO Robotics’ suite of solutions are centred upon the SESTO Automated Guided Vehicles (AGVs) and Intelligent Mobile Robots (IMRs), which are designed to automate traditionally labour-intensive material handling processes. Covering tasks such as transporting work-in-progress materials between work stations to movement of bulk materials in warehouses, SESTO AGVs and IMRs provide a flexible, smart and efficient choice to the user.

It takes a group of dedicated individuals to engineer the best products and solutions – and the team at SESTO Robotics include a strong, diverse workforce equipped with various technical know-how. Committed to provide solutions that meet customers’ requirements, the team ensures that each product delivered is reliable and engineered with the highest standards.

","

As a software QA engineer, you will be responsible for ensure that each software release is tested thoroughly and meets the highest possible standard before reaching our customers. You will be involved significantly in each development phase, from feature planning, documenting test cases, to carrying out tests and providing feedback to the development team.

You will be working closely with the product owner and development teams to achieve clear test requirements and plans to in order to create a stable and successful release.

As we continue to grow, you will be able to contribute to company best practices, testing methodology and automated tooling to amplify our output and product quality.

Responsibilities:

  • Understanding product features and intent
  • Ensure that software is properly tested before release
  • Ensure that each feature has test cases written and approved by stakeholders and developers
  • Creating and documenting test cases; keep test case library is up to date
  • Creating detailed test plans and procedures
  • Executing test plans and reporting on results
  • Discover and document code and product level bugs
  • Feedback issues to development team
  • Explore and implement new concepts in automated testing
  • Expand upon automated test coverage
  • Suggest ways to improve upon user experience
  • Reproduce bugs reported by customers
  • Compare existing test cases to bugs reported by customers and check for detection escape issues

Requirements:

  • Bachelor/Masters in Computer Science or related field
  • 2-4 years in a software QA engineering role
  • A solid foundation of software quality best practices and test methodology
  • Understand product requirements and devise test cases to cover operating scenarios
  • Create test sequences based on test cases
  • Execute manual or automated test sequences or regressions tests and generate a test report for the product stakeholders and development team
  • Create detailed bug reports with clear instructions how to reproduce them and track bug fixes and test fixes when complete
  • Ability to create and maintain defect and test case database and update automated test cases and scripts
  • Methodical approach to testing and documenting issues
  • Strong programming abilities in Python and C++, familiarity with CI/CD tools (Travis)
  • Experience with programming for the Web (HTTP, REST, XMLRPC, etc)
  • Ability to design test plans and scenarios
  • Experience testing distributed systems 
  • Experience in testing microservice architectures
  • Knowledge in backend and front end automated testing frameworks
  • Knowledge in behavioral testing frameworks (e.g. behave)
  • Working knowledge of version control systems (Git, Github)

If you are keen to join our team, please forward your detailed resume thru ""Apply Now"".

We regret that only shortlisted applicants will be notified.

Pan-United Corporation Ltd
Shaping Smart Cities for Tomorrow

Pan-United Corporation Ltd is a Singapore-grown and publicly-listed concrete innovation multinational company, with operations in four Asian countries and a workforce of more than 1,000 people. We have world-leading in-house R&D capabilities that have helped us to develop over 300 specialised concrete products, and counting.

Pan-United is in an exciting stage of our transformation to become a continuous innovator in the built environment industry and fulfill our vision of becoming a technology company in concrete and logistics.

Our use of advanced digital technologies including artificial intelligence and data analytics, allows us to manage up to 7,000 trucking trips a day. We have produced a ride-hailing platform goTruck! that matches the demand and supply of heavy vehicles in the built industry. Our latest offering is a scalable software-as-a-system (SAAS) called AiR, that optimises supply chains for cement and concrete companies.
For more information, please visit our website at www.panunited.com.sg

6,software,/en/job/senior-software-engineer-9360268,9360268,Senior/Software Engineer,False,False,6000,10000,SGD,YouTrip,10 hours ago,False,,20 days,201628225C,,,51 - 200 Employees,,,"
YouTrip is a regional financial technology startup based in Singapore and Hong Kong, dedicated to creating the best mobile financial services for travellers by simplifying overseas spending and creating a fuss-free travel experience. YouTrip's mission is to help people across Southeast Asia manage their money in a simpler yet smarter way, starting with a core focus on travellers. YouTrip partnered with Ez-Link and Mastercard to launch in Singapore in August 2018.
","

What is it about in one line?

Join us as a Software Engineer to make YouTrip, the fastest growing FinTech startup in Singapore, also the safest place to keep your money.

We are looking for Frontend, Backend, and FullStack Engineers across junior to senior levels.

Sounds interesting? Here’s more about us

YouTrip is Southeast Asia’s 1st and leading multi-currency wallet. As a regional financial technology startup, YouTrip is dedicated to creating the best mobile financial services by simplifying foreign currency payments and offering the best exchange rates. Launched in 2018, YouTrip has been voted the #1 multi-currency account in Singapore with the largest user base in the region following its successful launch in Thailand in partnership with Karsikornbank in 2019.

YouTrip is a Major Payment Institution licensed under the Monetary Authority of Singapore and awarded the Top FinTech Leaders 2020 by Singapore FinTech Association, and ASEAN’s Best Fintech Startup 2019 by the Rice Bowl Startup Awards.

Our culture is entrepreneurial, open & inclusive, and teamwork-oriented. We are looking for talents with the aspiration to thrive in a rapidly growing business in the exciting FinTech space.

 You will

·      Build a strong team as Singapore Tech Hub founding engineers. 

·      Design & develop high availability & secured server-side applications that will constitute our core platforms and provide services to our mobile application and business partners.

·      Create robust yet reliable highly transactional and event-driven application and infrastructure architectures.

·      Work with data scientists & analysts to create data pipeline infrastructure & machine learning platform

·      Design, create and run automated unit and integration testing for microservices and supporting systems/infrastructure.

·      Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features in a fast and iterative development process.

·      Participate in all phases of the development life cycle such as coding, code review, testing, and debugging.

You are

·      Passionate about technology – you have a minimum of 3 years of hands-on experience in software development, using Java, .Net, Python, or other popular languages; knowledge in Golang is a plus. You have a strong interest in working with microservices and cloud technologies.

·      Adaptable with a growth mindset – you want to grow and you learn by doing. You always value opportunities to improve. Obstacles and failures only motivate you to move forward.

·      A respectful and open team player – you are transparent about your work. You enjoy contributing to the team and you are also open to receiving and giving feedback in a respectful manner. Having experience in technical initiatives and leadership is also a great plus.

·      Excited about high-quality work – thoughtful and forward-thinking about system design and programming. You are resilient and you find satisfaction in overcoming challenges and solving puzzles.

What can you expect from us?

·      An innovative culture that encourages talents to work highly collaboratively in a respectful, friendly environment

·      Multi-cultural co-working space environment in CBD area

·      Direct report to the Head of Engineering and be part of the growth team of the Singapore business

·      Access to a deep bench of technical and business experts to work together

·      Working with an entrepreneurial team of people in Singapore, Thailand, and Hong Kong

GoalKeepin, a goal-achievement app that helps users achieve their goals in an ideal environment. We aim to help users to achieve long term goals with like-minded people, to be better together. The goals we curate fall under the categories of health, lifestyle, assets, relationships, hobbies and abilities. As many of us have difficulty sticking to the goals we set for ourselves, GoalKeepin bridges the gap between having a goal and achieving it via a cash reward system, a progress tracking tool and a community of like-minded people to encourage one another.

","Job description

GoalKeepin, a goal-achievement app that helps users achieve their goals in an ideal environment. We aim to help users to achieve long term goals with like-minded people, to be better together. The goals we curate fall under the categories of health, lifestyle, assets, relationships, hobbies and abilities. As many of us have difficulty sticking to the goals we set for ourselves, GoalKeepin bridges the gap between having a goal and achieving it via a cash reward system, a progress tracking tool and a community of like-minded people to encourage one another.

Responsibilities

  • Design and build new features on our mobile and web apps using React/React Native
  • Collaborate with the team to deliver an amazing user experience
  • Be a proactive team member and think critically to solve problems
  • Add positive value to the company culture

Desired Skills/Competencies

  • Full stack developer with experience in both Back-end & Front-end development.
  • Experience with Java 8, Spring Boot, JavaScript and JS frameworks like Angular, React or Typescript.
  • Knowledge in HTML5, CSS, Javascript, React, React Native, Redux, Angular, NodeJS, Java, Spring Boot, C#, Python AWS Cloud, J2ee
  • Experience with a JVM based language preferably Java version 8+.
  • Understanding of typical Java-based frameworks such as Spring MVC, Spring Boot etc.
  • Experience in developing in microservices architecture and/or writing Restful APIs.
  • Some experience with cloud platforms such as Microsoft Azure or Amazon Web Services (AWS).

Qualifications

  • BA/BS in Computer Science or related technical field, or equivalent experience.
  • 6+ years of professional software development experience.
  • Experienced in both iOS & Android.
  • Strong object-oriented programming knowledge along with good understanding of algorithms, data structures and design patterns.
  • ONLY Singaporeans may apply due to quota limitations.

column3: With close to 200 years of experience pioneering solutions to measure the world, Leica Geosystems products and services are trusted by professionals worldwide to help them capture, analyze, and present spatial information. Leica Geosystems is best known for its broad array of products that capture accurately, model quickly, analyze easily, and visualize and present spatial information.

Those who use Leica products every day trust them for their dependability, the value they deliver, and the superior customer support. Based in Heerbrugg, Switzerland, Leica Geosystems is a global company with tens of thousands of customers supported by more than 3,500 employees in 28 countries and hundreds of partners located in more than 120 countries around the world.
Leica Geosystems is part of Hexagon, Sweden.

column2:
We deliver competitive advantage to the world's leading semiconductor, electronics and automotive companies. Teradyne (NYSE:TER) is a leading supplier of Automatic Test Equipment. The company's divisions, Assembly Test, Semiconductor Test, and Vehicle Diagnostic Solutions, are organized by the products they develop and deliver. Assembly Test: A global leader in electronics testing and inspection solutions serving the world's leading original equipment manufacturer and electronics manufacturing services suppliers. ATD's Products and services include: In-Circuit Board Test Systems, Functional Test Platforms, Automated X-Ray Inspection, Military and Aerospace Test Solutions, Test, Design & Analysis Software, System Upgrade, Software and Parts, Factory Reconditioned, and Service Offerings. Semiconductor Test: The world's largest supplier of semiconductor test equipment for logic, RF, analog, power, mixed-signal, and memory technologies. We deliver test solutions to developers and manufacturers of a broad range of integrated circuits, packaged separately or integrated as cells in system-on-a-chip (SOC) devices. ICs tested by Teradyne are used in computing, communications, consumer, automotive, identification, and internet applications. Products include FLEX, J750, Tiger, and Catalyst. Vehicle Diagnostic Solutions: Teradyne Diagnostic Solutions is a global supplier of Manufacturing Configuration and Test, Service Bay Diagnostics and Telematics solutions for transportation OEMs and independent service providers. We provide technology, experience and processes to assist our customers to solve those problems and exploit the opportunities, helping them to accelerate time-to-market, improve quality, and reduce costs.","

Teradyne Software Engineering team is looking for a highly-motivated, energetic, technically driven Software Engineer to focus on the development of software systems for products within the Semiconductor Test division. Development occurs in a dynamic and challenging multi-site development environment.

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Design, implement and test system software in support of both the IG-XL development environment for the UltraFLEX family platform and Eagle software for the ETS platform. 
  • System software supports all digital and analog instruments, runs on various operating systems and this team architects and develops core services used by the driver teams.
  • The team also selects computing hardware that best matches product requirements and ensures that the software can run as a 32-bit and a 64-bit application.
  • Duties will include developing and analyzing software requirements, developing the functional specifications and design documents based on the requirements, implementation of the code using C#, C++, .Net and COM/ATL, and unit testing and verification of the code.
  • The candidate will be responsible to debug and solve complex software and computing issues.
  • The candidate will interface with a number of organizations on a daily basis.

Requirements:

  • BSCS, BSCE, BSEE or equivalent
  • Desired: at least 3 years experience with general software development experience with commercial applications
  • Project work involving developing software applications that control hardware products
  • Solid grasp of Object-Oriented Design and software data structures, UML is desirable
  • Proficiency in C#, C++ and OOD required
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills of complex systems is required.
  • Working knowledge of VB required.
  • Knowledge of UML Design, Rational Products (Clearcase, Rational Rose, Rational Purify, Rational PureCoverage, Rational Quantify…) is a plus
  • Ability to understand and debug complex a system is a plus.
  • Ability to work as part of software development team required.
  • Prior ATE experience and/or hardware knowledge is a plus.
  • Working knowledge of computing hardware is a plus.
  • Knowledge of Agile, C/I, JIRA is a plus.

19,software,/en/job/software-security-team-lead-9377733,9377733,Software Security Team Lead,False,False,7000,10000,SGD,Shopline Commerce Pte. Ltd.,22-Mar-22,False,,,202013665N,,,501 - 1000 Employees,,,"

Founded in 2013, SHOPLINE is Asia’s biggest smart commerce platform that empowers merchants to succeed everywhere. We provide a full-featured platform that allows merchants to easily build their online shop and deliver a seamlessly omni-channel experience. 

SHOPLINE’s key services include inventory and sales management, regional logistics, payment gateways, data analytics tools, storefront theme designs, local customer support, and everything you need to create a store. SHOPLINE has offices in Hong Kong, Taiwan, Kuala Lumpur, Ho Chi Minh City, Shenzhen, Guanzhou, Singapore and Bangkok. To date, SHOPLINE has helped over 250,000 merchants to open their online stores.

Our team is agile and we provide benefits and support comparable to overseas startups. If you are interested in e-commerce or working in a startup environment, come talk to us!

","

About SHOPLINE:

SHOPLINE is Asia’s largest smart commerce platform. With our customers in mind, we strive to deliver scalable commerce solutions to merchants of all sizes. We’re a full-featured platform with services including online store opening, O2O solution, retail POS systems, advertising placement, business strategy consultation, marketing, and more to empower merchants to succeed in omnichannel retailing and cross-border commerce.

What you’ll be doing:

  • Ensure technologies meet security requirements including the company’s policies, external guidelines, regulatory expectations, and appropriate controls in information security, secure design, and cyber security.
  • Work closely with the Devops and Development teams in architecture design and review to provide specific security expertise.
  • Work with the Engineer Director and IT Director to define and assess the security strategies, architectures and practices.
  • Develop and maintain security architecture artifacts.
  • Act as a Security SME and provide implementation design to the application and Infrastructure team.
  • Conduct Technical risk assessments to capture security exceptions and design associated compensating controls based on the assessment results.
  • Define and maintain the infrastructure and application security framework and provide security assessments.
  • Work closely with managed SOC service provider on the setup, daily operations and coordinating incident response
  • Evaluate and assess new / emerging technologies to cope with changing risk of the E-Commerce environment.

Who we are looking for:

  • Proven experience as a Cyber Security Architect or Information Security Consultant with design and architecture experience
  • Experience with Incident Response within cloud environments and applications
  • Bachelor or Master Degree in Computer Science or related field
  • Proven experience building security reference architecture for all-in cloud deployments and hybrid scenarios
  • Experience deploying applications in cloud-based platforms such as AWS and Google Cloud
  • Experience with cloud security technologies and platforms such as cloud network policy and firewalls, data encryption and key management
  • Subject Matter Expertise in enterprise security solutions such as the below
  1. Identity and Access Management
  2. IPS and Anti-DDOS
  3. Security Incident and Event Management
  4. Endpoint Protection
  5. Data Loss Prevention
  6. Mobile Security
  7. Cloud Access Security Brokers
  8. Others

""If you want to build a ship, don't drum up the men to just gather wood, divide the work and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea.""
- Antoine de Saint-Exupery (1900-1944)

Third Sight is a pioneer and leading provider of Email Knowledge Management (KM) solutions. Our software enables organisations to harness the collective intelligence from their corporate email, and is used even by customers who already have Microsoft's SharePoint, EMC's Documentum and other market-leading KM systems. Third Sight is deployed at many government agencies (including 8 out of 16 Government Ministries).

Innovation at Third Sight is not just talk - our software has been patented in both Singapore and United States. Our flagship product is an Official IDA Accredited Product (see www.ida.gov.sg/Startups/Accreditation) and we are a past winner of the Most Innovative Infocomm Product Merit Award winner in Singapore’s biennial National Infocomm Awards organized by IDA and SiTF.

Third Sight offers great growth opportunities for solid talent and quick-learners. We believe in respect for staff, team work, flexi-work, work-life balance, pleasant work environment, transparent culture, and above all, a meritocracy of ideas and actual performance over paper qualifications (even though our staff includes Ph.D. and Masters from prestigious U.S. and local universities).

","

RESPONSIBILITIES:

As a Product Software Engineer, you will work with an agile team of coders in an open environment, building solutions related to the following technology areas:

               * Knowledge Management

               * Search Engine

               * Data Analytics

You will be involved in the entire product development life cycle, and in the continuous improvement activities as we evolve our DevOps culture.

REQUIREMENTS:

Demonstrates passion and ability to understand and apply new technologies (any contributions to open source will be highly regarded)

Strong, proven development skills in one or more of the following areas:

               * .NET or Java (ASP.net preferred)

               * JavaScript frameworks

               * SQL (Microsoft SQL experience preferred)

Knowledge of scripting languages (e.g. Python, PowerShell) is advantageous

Good verbal and writing skills

Must be a team player, fast learner

Experience in software development

Degree or Diploma in Information Technology or related discipline

Since founding in 1937 in Japan, Daifuku has been contributing to the growth of the industrial world by supplying the most advanced and suitable material handling systems in various fields for our customers all over the world.

Specialists in logistics for over 60 years We have grown into the world’s most comprehensive supplier of material handling systems, dealing with all kinds of AMHS (automated material handling systems) and peripheral equipment.

With the set up of its wholly-owned subsidiary in 1982, Daifuku has actively carved itself a niche in Singapore’s Material Handling market, especially Automated Storage & Retrieval System (ASRS) with the largest installation record (over 45 sites) and customer base in Singapore.
Consulting & Engineering for Logistics
We don’t just sell a system. We work with our customers from consultation to equipment planning and project implementation in order to suggest the most suitable solution for them.

From basic storage systems to complex distribution and handling facilities, and Warehouse Management System (WMS), Daifuku Singapore has accumulated vast amount of engineering expertise and experience to offer total consulting and engineering services for logistics.
Complete In-house Support
Daifuku Singapore offers the full range of maintenance and spare parts service covering all aspects of AMHS equipment, computer hardware and software.

These services are tailored variously to customer requirements ranging from comprehensive preventive maintenance, remote software diagnostics, telephone helpdesk to 24 hrs on-site support ensuring minimum response time to any emergency situations.
Daifuku Singapore maintains a well-stocked spare parts warehouse for its local customers as well as the Asean region.

25,software,/en/job/software-verification-engineer-9368038,9368038,Software Verification Engineer,False,False,,,SGD,Teradyne Asia Pte Ltd,19-Mar-22,False,,,200311819K,,,51 - 200 Employees,,Science Park 2,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
We deliver competitive advantage to the world's leading semiconductor, electronics and automotive companies. Teradyne (NYSE:TER) is a leading supplier of Automatic Test Equipment. The company's divisions, Assembly Test, Semiconductor Test, and Vehicle Diagnostic Solutions, are organized by the products they develop and deliver. Assembly Test: A global leader in electronics testing and inspection solutions serving the world's leading original equipment manufacturer and electronics manufacturing services suppliers. ATD's Products and services include: In-Circuit Board Test Systems, Functional Test Platforms, Automated X-Ray Inspection, Military and Aerospace Test Solutions, Test, Design & Analysis Software, System Upgrade, Software and Parts, Factory Reconditioned, and Service Offerings. Semiconductor Test: The world's largest supplier of semiconductor test equipment for logic, RF, analog, power, mixed-signal, and memory technologies. We deliver test solutions to developers and manufacturers of a broad range of integrated circuits, packaged separately or integrated as cells in system-on-a-chip (SOC) devices. ICs tested by Teradyne are used in computing, communications, consumer, automotive, identification, and internet applications. Products include FLEX, J750, Tiger, and Catalyst. Vehicle Diagnostic Solutions: Teradyne Diagnostic Solutions is a global supplier of Manufacturing Configuration and Test, Service Bay Diagnostics and Telematics solutions for transportation OEMs and independent service providers. We provide technology, experience and processes to assist our customers to solve those problems and exploit the opportunities, helping them to accelerate time-to-market, improve quality, and reduce costs.","

We have an immediate need for a talented Applications oriented Software Verification Engineer to join our Quality Engineering Team in Singapore. The Quality Engineering (QE) Team is responsible for assessing Quality at all stages of the Product Development Life Cycle so that Teradyne maintains its Quality leadership in the Automatic Test Equipment industry. 

A Software Verification Engineer on the QE team will use Teradyne Software - IGXL (MS Excel/Visual Basic based) and work with in-house tools and cutting-edge digital and analog hardware.

Responsibilities
  • Reviewing system, hardware, and software requirements
  • Planning, Designing, creating, executing, and automating User oriented tests focused on proving our products work as planned
  • Creating and enhancing our Quality Screens in a Continuous Delivery/Integration environment
  • Aligning our testing and screens to our customers' needs 
  • Enhancing in-house tools to make test creation more efficient and effective 
  • Managing the defects in the defect tracking database in the reporting, duplication and resolution of issues found during product verification.
  • Interact with software, field applications, and hardware engineering teams, and work closely with Software Development Engineering and Field Applications teams.
  • Provide expertise to the applications team and learn from them in order to reduce defect escapes.
Basic Qualifications & Skills
  • BSEE/BSCS/BS Computer Engineering/BS Software Engineering or equivalent
  • Strong experience with Agile and/or Waterfall Software Development Life Cycles
  • History/experience of using Teradyne Testers (or equivalent)
  • Programming with C/C++, C# (or equivalent) and/or VBA/Excel
  • Strong commitment to product quality.
  • Strong team player with good interpersonal and problem-solving skills. 
  • Effective written and verbal communications skills in English
  • Prior programming experience on Teradyne or other semiconductor ATE platform is required. 
  • Able to work in an international, multi-site, dynamic, team-oriented environment
  • Represent QE department at Senior Managers project reviews
  • Development background preferred.
  • Years of experience: minimum 5

JOB RESPONSIBILITY:

  • Possess a strong foundation in the software development life cycle (SDLC) consistently apply software best practices.
  • Maintaining existing website and develop new functions base on the given technical and system design specification.
  • Performs complex data processing and analysis regularly and to provide informative report for decision.
  • Analysing and understanding key user requirements and identifying user needs.
  • Develop new or enhance existing software modules based on the identified key user requirements.
  • Writing high quality, clean and concise codebase that is highly efficient, scalable, easily portable, and maintainable.
  • Integrate 3rd party software or software frameworks and strive to ensure full compatibility with the suite of software.
  • Collaborate cross-functionally with clients, team leaders, project managers and other engineers to design elegant and efficient solutions.
  • Write unit test and integration test plans and test cases.
  • Execute test cases, troubleshoot bugs, and refine code before committing to the downstream team members.
  • Responding, investigating, resolving, communicating root cause analysis, and recommending and implementing solutions in a timely manner as required.
  • Establishing a timeline and protocol for harder-to-solve problems and communicating troubleshooting analysis to IT support in order to assist them to manage client expectations.
  • Document and maintain knowledge through code, code comments, diagrams, flowcharts, layouts, and other technical documentation in written form for the purpose of knowledge retention and transfer.
  • Stay up-to-date on new and emerging technologies by hands-on research, reading, and attending courses with strong desire for continuous improvement in technical skillsets.
  • Any other tasks as designated by the Company.

JOB REQUIREMENTS:

  • Minimum Diploma/Degree in Computer Science/Software Engineering or related discipline.
  • At least 1 years of web development experience in various framework
  • Good knowledge and understanding of PHP frameworks
  • Proficiency in JavaScript, Vue.js
  • Proficiency in front-end development tools/languages, such as Html5,CSS, SCSS/LESS
  • Domain expertise with build frameworks, tools, and services(Node.js, Webpack, NPM, Yarn, etc.)
  • Experience with source code control systems such as SVN, CVS or Git
  • Self-driven and perform duties and responsibilities independently with minimum supervision.

32,software,/en/job/it-software-project-coordinator-9347442,9347442,IT (Software) Project Coordinator,False,False,3000,4500,SGD,DL Ideas Pte. Ltd.,19-Mar-22,False,,7 days,201500700D,,,1 - 50 Employees,,Ubi Techpark,"

Established in 2015, DL ideas is a Singapore based information technology company dedicated to the success of our clients – by turning the brilliant ideas into reality with the power of technology.

Being one of the few IT companies focusing on developing customized software for education industry in Singapore, we have a very experienced team of software engineers and programmers providing high quality and cost-effective IT solutions according to the unique needs of each client. Besides, we also have expertise in custom enterprise system development, mobile APP development and e-commerce solution.

","

As a fast growing IT solution company, we are currently looking for software project coordinator to join our project team, responsible for the entire project lifecycle from gathering customer’s requirements until final delivery, under the direction of project manager.

Responsibilities:

· Primarily responsible for co-ordination between client and programmer team to ensure the project is delivered based on the agreed specifications and within the timeline;

· Work closely with programmer team to ensure the requirements gathered are realistic and implementable;

· Test the developed functions and make sure all errors/bugs are fixed before delivering to client;

· Effectively communicate project status to clients and maintain a good relationship with clients;

· Prepare project documentations, eg. project progress report, Software Requirement Specs documents, UAT report, project final delivery report, user manual, etc.

Requirement:

· Diploma or degree holder with at least 1-year experience in software project coordinating

· Knowledge in software development and web technologies will be an advantage

· Excellent communication and interpersonal skill

· Diligent attitude and willing to learn

Rewards & Benefits:

· Friendly and relaxed working environment

· Remuneration: attractive salary package (Negotiable based on experience)

· 5 days’ work week

· Full attendance incentive

· Reward will be given based on performance

We are a result-orientated company. To us, deliver quality work on time is most important. We are looking for energetic and committed personnel who are self-motivated and willing to learn. We want the employees to grow together with the company.

IF you would like to apply for this position, please kindly send your CV with the following info:

· Reason for leaving your current job

· Last drawn salary and expected salary

· Notice period

33,software,/en/job/algorithm-engineer-computer-vision-9358188,9358188,Algorithm Engineer (Computer Vision),False,False,,,SGD,Huawei International Pte Ltd,10 hours ago,False,,15 days,200717119C,,,1001 - 2000 Employees,,Buona Vista,"
Huawei Technologies is a leader in providing next generation telecommunications networks, and now serves 35 of the world's top 50 operators, along with over one billion users worldwide. The company is committed to providing innovative and customized products, services and solutions to create long-term value and growth potential for its customers.

Huawei's products and solutions encompassing wireless products(HSDPA/WCDMA/EDGE/ GPRS/GSM, CDMA2000 1xEV-DO/CDMA2000 1X, TD-SCDMA, WiMAX), core network products ( IMS, Mobile Softswitch, NGN ), network products(FTTx, xDSL, Optical, Routers, LAN Switch), applications and software(IN, mobile data service, BOSS), as well as terminals(UMTS/CDMA). Major products are designed based on Huawei's ASIC chipset and utilize shared platforms to provide quality and cost-effective products.

At the end of Dec. 2008, Huawei has over 100,000 employees, of whom 48% are dedicated to R&D. Huawei's global R&D centers are located in Bangalore in India, Silicon Valley and Dallas in USA, Stockholm in Sweden and Moscow in Russia in addition to those in Beijing, Shanghai, Nanjing, Shenzhen, Hangzhou and Chengdu in China.

For more information about Huawei, please visit http://www.huawei.com
","

Duties & Responsibilities:

● Involved in the research and development for various cutting-edge machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, computer graphic algorithms.

● Collaborate with engineer team and advance AI algorithms performance in various applications.

Skills / Qualifications:

● PhD in the area of Machine Learning, Deep learning, Computer Vision, Computer Graphics, or similar area.

● Solid foundations of maths and algorithms: probability statistic, linear algebra, geometry, optimization method, image processing, 3D modeling, .etc.

● 3-5 years’ experience in computer vision algorithm design and implementation and excellent skills in at least one of machine learning/deep learning tools such as Tensor-flow, Pytorch, MxNet, .etc.

● Fast learning ability, to be able to understand and evaluate cutting edge paper within a short time.

34,software,/en/job/embedded-software-engineer-9299319,9299319,Embedded Software Engineer,False,False,,,SGD,OSIM International Pte. Ltd.,18-Mar-22,False,,2 days,198304191N,,,201 - 500 Employees,,,"

Established in 1980, OSIM is a pioneer and global leader in branded healthy lifestyle products. Always at the forefront of innovation and development, OSIM constantly uses innovative retail concepts and enhances its research and development capabilities to produce the most comprehensive range of well being products. These award winning designs and patented technologies further strengthen our vision to inspire well being across all aspects for our customers.

OSIM is about the experience of total well-being living an inspiring life. This is channeled at each and every customer touch point, communicating our values through our products, our outlet, our brand image, our service excellence and in-depth knowledge of holistic health.

With consistent exemplary performance in all our key markets, our effective and direct control over our expanding global retail network and the innovation of new products, OSIM now operates a wide point of sales, with more than 435 outlets in more than 89 cities across 20 countries in Asia, Oceania, the Middle East, Europe and North America.

As the world turns to healthy lifestyle alternatives, there has never been a better time for OSIM to inspire life by bringing in our philosophy of holistic well being to the world. Discover what it means to work at OSIM, where inspiring well being begins with you.

","

OSIM is looking for a responsible Embedded Software Engineer with team spirit to develop Communication Daughter Cards (CDC) in our IoT products. 

Responsibilities

  • Work with Mobile Engineer, Backend Engineer, UX designer, and CDC Vendor in a digital team to develop wireless communication firmware on PCB for IOT products
  • Develop new feature for different type, such as WIFI, BlueTooth, ZigBee, 2G, and versions of CDC
  • Do code review for vendor and other team members on embedded software code basing on Github
  • Maintain existing code base and provide bug fixes
  • Analyse, monitor and improve efficiency, stability of the CDC system
  • Involve in schematic and PCB design process
  • Work with a variety of microcontroller, SDK and communication protocol
  • Work closely with team members to ensure the project is delivered on time

Requirements

  • 3 to 5 years of experience in embedded software engineering
  • Familiar with Agile (Scrum) team cooperation process
  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electronic Engineering or its equivalent
  • Proficient in C, C++ programming in MCU and Linux environment
  • Familiar with Git software version control
  • Strong verbal communication and writing skills in English and Mandarin as there will be needs to communicate with our China team of developers.
  • Able to read schematics and datasheets
  • Experience in developing and troubleshooting on embedded products
  • Experience with wireless network stack such as Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, BLE, Zigbee, Cellular, etc

35,software,/en/job/senior-software-engineer-9341723,9341723,Senior Software Engineer,False,False,,,SGD,Schaefer Systems International Pte Ltd,18-Mar-22,False,,,198402177E,,,51 - 200 Employees,,,"

As the leading provider of intralogistics solutions, SSI SCHAEFER is always looking for dedicated employees who would like to shape the future of intralogistics with us. Our product spectrum ranges from highly dynamic storage and logistics systems to state-of-the-art workshop, company and office equipment to innovative products for waste engineering and recycling. SSI SCHAEFER developed all of the products and solutions with the passion and expertise of many people. That is why employee satisfaction is so important to us and why we value your dedication. 10,500 employees across 70 worldwide operative subsidiaries and at more than ten domestic and international production sites work to create the outstanding quality of the SSI SCHAEFER brand.

","

Necessary Experience:

• At least 5 years of experience in a similar role and industry

• Implemented complex warehouse automation projects (min 3 years), with transport optimisation, inventory management and WMS functions

• Experience working with multiple warehouse automated devices (Pallet Crane, Mini-load crane, shuttles, A-Frame, conveyor, carousel, etc).

• Tech lead, responsible for architectural design, commissioning and ramp-up of the solution.

Key Responsibilities:

• Responsible for the technical architecture of the solution

• Responsible for the overall planning and execution of design, coding, and testing tasks of the project

• Define work packages and identify efficient resource allocation

• Implement best-practice in design and development and facilitate reviews

• Facilitate integration test with the automation

• Optimise automated flow to increase throughput and performance

• Provide software solution development and support services to the Software & Integration and Customer Service and Support (CSS) departments for IT projects.

• Provide ramp-up support according to the customer’s operational hours as part of the overall project delivery.

• As a Level 3 support engineer, the role is rostered 24x7 at least 10 weeks per year, providing availability and timely WAMAS-C technical support to sites in the production environment, as defined in the WAMAS-C Technical Support On-call Guide. The definition of Level 3 support is detailed in the Principles of Cooperation – CSS Section 5.2. A defined service-level agreement (SLA) is indicated for each category of call.

• Provide Level 1 and 2 WAMAS-C technical support as per the Principles of Cooperation – CSS for newly established sites or sites that have gone through a major retrofit/upgrade.

• Train and mentor CSS Support Engineers to enable the CSS team to provide up to Level 2 support.

Technical Skills:

• Complex development experience using Java, HTML, CSS

• Strong SQL

• Advanced knowledge of Oracle Database, Unix, and network concepts

• Waterfall / Agile methodologies

• Domain knowhow of complex warehouse automated solutions

• Ability to define requirements and identify corresponding functionality within the software products

• Participate in commissioning and testing at customer sites as required

• Provide automated tests to assigned modules to minimise testing efforts in the future.

• Generate quality technical documentation as required within the project realisation process.

• Perform root-cause analysis of issues and recommend optimum solution.

• Conduct technical training

· Friendly environment

· Experienced in providing technical support for applications as Tier/ Level 1 for at least 1 year;

Rewards & Benefits

· Friendly working environment

We are a result-orientated company. To us, deliver work on time and accurately is the most important key to value an employee. We are looking for energetic and committed personnel who are self-motivated and willing to learn. We want the employees to grow together with the company.

RFNet is a subsidiary of Panasonic. It designs Products and System Solutions with expertise in Wireless, IT Security, IT Network and CCTV Surveillance.We invite result oriented, independent and self-motivated professionals to join our team.
","

Job Scope:

To design and develop Application Software//Embedded firmware for user interface equipment, and device control equipment as follows:-

  • Designs and implements systems using a variety of languages (e.g. C, C++, C#, Java, etc.);
  • Designs enhancements, updates, and programming changes for subsystems, including embedded code;
  • Designs embedded firmware using C/C++;
  • Designs application software using C#;
  • Enhances on firmware-specific capabilities;
  • Writes and executes complete testing plans, protocols, and documentation;
  • Identifies and debugs, and creates solutions for issues with code and integration into application architecture;
  • Collaborates and communicates with management, internal, and outsourced development partners regarding firmware design status, project progress, and issue resolution; and
  • Analyzes designs to determine coding, programming, and integration activities required based on general objectives and knowledge of overall architecture of product or solution.

Requirement:

  • Degree in Computer Science or Embedded System.
  • Proficiency and experience in C, C++, C#, Java, UML, angular JS.
  • Good knowledge in application software programing for Linux and Windows.
  • Knowledge and experience with network programming and database programming.

39,software,/en/job/senior-software-engineer-java-full-stack-9365346,9365346,"Senior Software Engineer (Java, full stack)",False,False,,,SGD,Adnovum Singapore Pte Ltd,19-Mar-22,False,,12 days,201003865Z,,,1 - 50 Employees,,,"<div>

column2: Adnovum Introduction: Headquartered in Zurich, Adnovum is a leading IT consultancy and software house that specialises in the implementation of demanding security, mission-critical applications and integration projects. We are known for our technological competence and innovative strength. Our solutions are often deployed on a national level and functions as major cornerstones of the country's economy.

For more than 30 years, Adnovum has developed a reputation for being a trusted technology partner. Retaining more than 90% of our customers annually, we have forged strong relationships with public sector agencies, global banks, insurance companies, and other renowned enterprises looking to establish secure digital environments. Adnovum employs over 500 staff worldwide and runs offices in Zurich, Bern, Budapest, Singapore and Ho Chi Minh.","

Your role:

As a Senior Software Engineer in Adnovum, you will work with highly skilled and experienced engineers who have their work measured against the highest standards.

The projects you work on will not only solve the customers’ problems but deliver the added value that defines all Adnovum' s software solutions. The main task of a senior software engineer is to design and develop new solution features according to the requirements and along a defined road-map in a timely manner.

Responsibilities and Duties:

In your daily work, you will:

  • Analyze functional requirements to translate into application design using established design methodologies and guidelines.
  • Develop the software conforming to design, program guidelines and programming best practices.
  • Develop unit test package, execute test & document test results to ensure the quality of the program
  • Investigate all reported problems/errors and implement fixes for the Issues/problems so that the system can operate correctly and efficiently.
  • Assist in the integration testing, system testing, user acceptance testing and implementation activities to fix the reported problem/bugs of the system to ensure the smooth execution of programs in the respective environments
  • Prepare and maintain up-to-date system documentation
  • Collaborate with other Adnovum employees in cross-functional teams to achieve goals
  • Mentor Junior team members

You will have the chance to be involved with multiple stages of a project, thus enjoying exposure to various aspects of software engineering and foster your career growth. You will also get the great opportunities to learn on the job and expand horizons into the field of consulting in the area system and application security.

Your experience and skills:

To master this job, you should have/be

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent

Minimum 5 years of experience in developing enterprise application using following technologies:

  • Java/Java EE
  • Microservices development 
  • API development 
  • Spring: Spring framework, Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring Batch, Spring Integration
  • JS front-end frameworks: Angular, React.JS
  • Docker, Kubernetes, RedHat Openshift
  • Public Cloud: Azure

Experience in agile software development (e.g. TDD, state-of-the-art CI/CD tools and DevOps automation)

Knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap

Knowledge of Relational Databases (MySQL, SQL Server)

Excellent English skills, both spoken and written

Experience in writing technical documents and providing effort estimations

Customer facing experience with effective listening and interaction skills

Experience in mentoring junior project team members

Proactive mindset that is creative and solution oriented

Strong team player with effective communication skills

About us

Headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland, Adnovum has been delivering robust and secure software solutions for 30 years. Our belief in constantly challenging ourselves and delivering value has built us a reputation for outstanding software engineering expertise.

Adnovum Singapore was established as the regional hub for APAC in 2010 and today, we have around 40 employees working on a multitude of projects across the finance, logistics and the public sectors.

What software engineers can expect at Adnovum:

  • Grow and thrive in an engineering-oriented environment
  • Mentoring by highly skilled and experienced software engineers/architects
  • Well-equipped IT environment with state-of-the-art technology
  • Mutually respectful work environment with no micro-management
  • Flat hierarchy to facilitate communication between roles
  • Healthy work-life balance

column3: The multi-screen streaming video and the interactive TV space is growing rapidly. Accedo delivers rich media apps on multiple platforms ranging from Smart TVs, gaming consoles and media devices to smart phones and tablets.

At Accedo, you will be part of a diverse and multi-disciplined development team, gaining exposure to cutting-edge technologies. This means working with some of the largest global media brands in the industry, e.g. Netflix, Spotify, BBC, HBO and Deutsche Telekom, just to name a few. Working in a highly collaborative and international environment, you will help transform requirements and designs into high performing feature rich applications on a wide variety of web based platforms and devices

column1:
","

Accedo - Transforming the Video Experience

Accedo develops applications and full stack solutions for the Television, Broadcast and Streaming industry for the world's leading video service providers, providing a range of exciting challenges for our Engineering, Design, QA and Solution Teams. We offer a portfolio of experience-centric video solutions that enable our customers to monetise video and transform video services to meet rapidly changing consumer expectations and to compete better.

Headquartered in Stockholm, we have 15 other offices across the globe whereas you will be in a truly global working environment. As our industry continues to evolve, so do we. We have recently created a new Solutions function in Asia-Pacific, that will spearhead a new wave of solutions that meet the needs of our APAC clients. From technical feasibility through to Proof of Concepts, across multiple platforms/devices across both client and middleware. We will investigate new relevant technologies and create innovative solutions, solving tomorrow’s problems today.

Requirement

No one day will be the same, we will look at different technologies, programming languages, architectures and frameworks. As a small team we need to be able to adapt quickly, remain ultra flexible, learn as we go, show initiative and thrive on change!

As a Software Engineer in the Solutions Function, you will be responsible for investigating the technical feasibility of new Solution ideas and creating Proof of Concepts for demonstrations to clients. You will be a contributor to the Sales team, ensuring that they are prepared with working demos and relevant subject matter information.

What we need from you

  • 3+ years of industry experience, preferably building web applications using high performance JavaScript/TypeScript on front and back end
  • Proficient knowledge of web architecture concepts including HTTP & REST and experience of Design and Architectural patterns and know when to apply them
  • Solid experience in React / Preact required, and knowledge of Node.js, webpack, Babel and build process.
  • Experience with a few core AWS services e.g. S3, EC2, Lambda
  • Experience with continuous integration and/or automated testing frameworks
  • Experience contributing to technical discussions and providing solid opinions/rationale for your decisions.
  • Strong communication skills, not afraid to ask for help and bounce ideas off peers
  • A strong problem solver with out of the box thinking, you will be self-motivated to find answers

The highly desirable list

  • Knowledge of GraphQL and some popular frameworks e.g. Apollo
  • Swift and/or Kotlin experience
  • AWS Developer or Solutions Architect Certification

We aim to be the company that could add value to OpenText and partners. Creating a positive Enterprise Content Management landscape for OpenText products.

Mission: To better organize customer documents by creating an efficient taxonomy, ensuring confidential documents are secure, and developing business fitting unique modules. This is done through honest feedback, cultivating close relationship with customer and agile development. We strive to be the best boutique style OpenText Enterprise Content Management and Content Server specialist in Singapore and Asia, working very closely with our customers to produce quality services that meet their exact needs

AIT Technologies (AIT) was established in year 2011, providing ICT products in the aspect of interactive solution; largely in Intelligent Automated Machines and Self-service Kiosks.

Focusing on Human-Machine Interactive Technologies as our core R&D, it’s not only providing our customers with high level of user experience while interacting with the product but also provides human analytics data to strengthen their business and better perform DIQ (Digital Artificial IQ) processes. These core technologies are applied into the company products such as DigiQuin™(Retail), 1st Hotel Licensing Board’s Approved Self Check-in/out Kiosk (Hospitality) and Self Health-screening Kiosk (Licensed via public healthcare cluster) with highly disruptive growing potential.

AIT’s also provide customisation of kiosk with their professional designer, providing customer their leading edge in demand and lifestyle concept. Our standard Kiosk designs are also constantly reflesh to stay relevant to our disruptive and everchanging trends.

Today, AIT’s has become the leader in this industry from many government’s, commercial users and credentials.

43,software,/en/job/java-application-developer-9306938,9306938,Java Application Developer,False,False,4500,6300,SGD,Atos Information Technology (S) Pte Ltd,21-Mar-22,False,,1 day,198301096E,,,201 - 500 Employees,,,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

Atos is a global leader in digital transformation with 110,000 employees in 73 countries and annual revenue of € 12 billion. European number one in Cloud, Cybersecurity and High-Performance Computing, the Group provides end-to-end Orchestrated Hybrid Cloud, Big Data, Business Applications and Digital Workplace solutions. In the UK & Ireland Atos delivers business technology solutions for some of the country’s largest public and private sector organisations The Group is the Worldwide Information Technology Partner for the Olympic & Paralympic Games and operates under the brands Atos, Atos|Syntel, and Unify. Atos is a SE (Societas Europaea), listed on the CAC40 Paris stock index.

The purpose of Atos is to help design the future of the information space. Its expertise and services support the development of knowledge, education and research in a multicultural approach and contribute to the development of scientific and technological excellence. Across the world, the Group enables its customers and employees, and members of societies at large to live, work and develop sustainably, in a safe and secure information space.

","

Job Description :

AppBank Operations is a 24x7, two city model unified production management team supporting the business application of the firm using cutting-edge systems and processes that form the core of our key business, sharing best practices while providing a critical mass to help drive transformation. The team also adopts various tools developed by AppBank Engineering team to automate failures using machine learning techniques, notify discrepancies in the health of production and automation of health-restoration, with a focus on continuous measurement of risk and cost. 

As an AppBank Operations Engineer, you will be part of the Technology Division's ""Run-The-Bank"" production management organization within Goldman Sachs. This is a role in the production function for technologies and systems that support the Firm's various business functions. 

• Work actively with team members to analyze and resolve application issues 

• Identify defects, discrepancies, and trends by ways of code debugging or log analysis 

• Manage incidents and effectively communicate with users, application owners and senior stakeholders across all areas 

• Improve application stability and performance by observing patterns, recurring failures and/or issues, and advise application owners on permanent fixes accordingly 

• Adopt various tools developed by AppBank Engineering team to automate failures using machine learning techniques and notify discrepancies in the health of production and automation of health-restoration, with a focus on continuous measurement of risk and cost. 

• Identify alerts / processes that can be automated and then work with AppBank Engineering team in automating them 

• Challenge existing application setup, processing and suggest different ways to solve problem or improve stability 

• Actively participate in Change management process with view to manage risk in production environment 

• Build and improve run books for generalists to minimize operational errors and gain fungibility/efficiency 

• Develop reports that provide trending statistics to track and manage application health and support service performance 

• Willing to learn and troubleshoot/support proprietary technologies not available through market place. No knowledge of proprietary technologies is required pre-hire. 

Basic Qualifications: 

• Master's Degree (U.S. or equivalent) and two to five years of software development experience 

OR

• Bachelor's Degree (U.S. or equivalent) and five years of software development experience 

• Computer Science concept of Data Structures in practical use cases: 

• Problem solving in a development or production environment, including experience observing patterns, analyzing root cause, and suggesting ideas to resolve issues 

• Good communication skills with ability to articulate the technical and functional aspects of a development/production problem to help drive solutions with App Dev teams and stakeholders 

• One of the following Structured or Object-Oriented programming languages: Java, C, C++, VB, .NET, ASP or Angular etc. 

• One of the following Scripting languages: Shell script, Perl, JavaScript, or Python etc. 

• One of the following RDBMS environments: Sybase ASE/IQ, Oracle or DB2. 

Preferred Qualifications: 

• Experience in the Financial Service Industry 

• Experience in Cluster Computing and Big Data solutions: Spark, Hadoop, HDSF, XRS using public cloud 

• Degree in Computer Science

Realtek Semiconductor Corp., located in the Hsinchu Science-based Industrial Park — Taiwan's ""Silicon Valley"" — began with a small group of devoted engineers in 1987. Over three decades, these founding engineers built Realtek into one of the world's largest and most successful IC design houses.
<div style=""text-align:justify"">

Realtek's efforts to provide the ultimate in pioneering IC technology — along with its firm commitment to creating unique and innovative designs for a broad range of high-tech applications — have won the company a worldwide reputation and made possible a favorable and consistent growth rate in the years since its establishment. We attribute this achievement to Realtek's tradition of excellence.
<div style=""text-align:justify"">
Company Snapshot
<div>
CAPITAL (in US$) : 153 Million USD
NUMBER of EMPLOYEES : Approx. 5,400+ Worldwide
BUSINESS SCOPE :  Design, Test, and Distribute ICs; ASIC Service
PRODUCTS: Communications Network ICs, Computer Peripheral ICs, Multimedia ICs

","

SoC Software Engineer  (KL, Malaysia) 

[Job Descriptions]

1、Develop APK to meet customer’s requirement

2、Handle Live TV and country logo related issues for different countries

3、Handle HDMI CEC, ARC, and compliance test related issues

4、Handle media player related issues

5、Debug Google certification related issues(CTS, GTS, VTS…)

6、Debug OTT certification related issues(Netflix, Youtube, Amazon)7、Develop TV Middleware8、Support customer factory request and manufacture related issues 

[Job Requirements]

1、Familiar with C/C++, Java programming language

2、Experience on TV, Set-top box, Smart phone, multimedia player products.

3、Better having experience with: Linux kernel driver porting or development、Android APK development、TV related experience(ATSC 1.0/ATSC 3.0/DVB/ISDB)、Android framework (TIF/HAL/HIDL)、Media playback、HDMI CEC/ARC、Android certification debug experience(CTS/GTS/VTS)、OTT certification experience(Netflix/Youtube/Amazon)、Wifi(WOWL)、Middleware (Ginga/FreeviewHD/HbbTV/CI+/SI)、ATV(NTSC, PAL, SECAM)、Subtitle(CC, TT)、System debug skill(Memory leak, Memory trash, Performance analysis).

4、Work Location: KL area, Malaysia.

5、For applicant who legally allowed to work in Malaysia only.  

Realtek Malaysia officially opened in June 2020, located in the KL City area, and is a wholly owned subsidiary of Realtek Semiconductor Corp. from Hsinchu, Taiwan. We aims to attract top R&D talents in Malaysia and the greater Southeast Asia. We efforts to provide the ultimate in pioneering Multimedia IC technology.

46,software,/en/job/senior-software-engineer-9339328,9339328,Senior Software Engineer,False,False,,,SGD,DYNAMITE GAMES PTE. LTD.,19-Mar-22,False,,28 days,202114251Z,,,1 - 50 Employees,,Ubi,"<div>

column2:
Dynamite Games is an indie game studio specialising in mobile game development on Unity and Html5. In less than 2 years, we have grown from 11 members to 100+ and shipped more than 2 dozen games growing our daily active player base by the thousands every month. We also build other creative products that compliment our business model and aspire to drive it to the next level. With such a trajectory, we have every intention to keep the momentum going for the good work done by the talented and enthusiastic game lovers in the studio.We have Dynamite Games makers in Singapore(HQ), Malaysia, Vietnam and Taiwan. We have battle-tested entrepreneurs and leaders leading each functional department from developing games to marketing and operationalising them. We look forward to bolstering our engineering capabilities with this listing.","

Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Participate in the entire software development lifecycle, focusing on solution design, coding, deployment and debugging.
  • To build games backend services that power Html5 and Unity games.
  • To brainstorm solutions and design robust, highly scalable applications that can withstand high traffic with minimum down time together with engineers from other countries.
  • To work closely with product owners, key users, artists and the quality assurance team to ensure deliverables are as per expectation. 
  • Develop ideas for new products, or features by monitoring industry developments and trends.
  • Participating in continuing education and training to remain current on best practices, learn new programming languages, and better assist other team members.
  • Troubleshoot applications, conduct performance testing and optimize services to enhance user experience and minimize resource consumption.
  • To provide off-duty support.

Requirements:

  • Minimally 4 years of software engineering experience across the full development lifecycle.
  • Thorough understanding of Computer Science fundamentals such as OOP, RESTful architectures, Design Patterns etc. 
  • Minimally 3 years of web development experience using Ruby on Rails.
  • Working experience in Html5 and Typescript.
  • Proficient with both NoSQL & SQL (Mongo, Redis, MySQL)
  • Working experience of containerization framework (Docker, Rancher, Kubernetes). 
  • Good understanding of authentication frameworks and data communication protocols like webSockets, signalR, Socket.IO. 
  • Good working knowledge of CI/CD environments or pipelines. (Gitlab, Jenkins, AWS Codepipeline)
  • Familiar with cloud technologies (AWS and Digital Ocean). Example: IAM, EC2, Lambda, AWS RDS, Elasticsearch, AWS CodeBuild etc.
  • Other skills required: Redis Pub/Sub, Cache & Message Broker. 
  • Able to fulfill off-hours production support.
  • Collaborative team member with good communication skills in english and chinese.

Bonus:

  • Experience in designing game backends using Ruby on Rails.
  • Experience in building games in Cocos or UNITY.
  • Domain knowledge of the game industry from game development to actual game operation.
  • Experience in data engineering tools like Jupyter and Python.

We are looking for a Blockchain Developer to drive the delivery of the highest-quality technology while monitoring the schedule. You are also responsible for overseeing the project's technology integration into high-quality games.

This is a perfect role for candidates looking to step-up in the ladder whilst also gaining invaluable experience in the Web3.0 ecosystem.

This role requires a thorough knowledge of blockchain, team Leadership, and programming languages.

What You Will Do

  • Understand the group business and deliver a plan to consolidate all data collected under a platform and maximize the data usage under the whole group of companies
  • Develop technical aspects of the company’s strategy to ensure alignment with its business goals
  • Discover and implement new technologies that yield a competitive advantage
  • Supervise system infrastructure to ensure functionality and efficiency
  • Build quality assurance and data protection processes
  • Monitor KPIs and IT budgets to assess technological performance
  • Use stakeholders’ feedback to inform necessary improvements and adjustments to technology
  • Communicate technology strategy to partners and investors

  • Manage overseas apps developers and virtually manage them
  • A hands-on person that has the know-how to develop apps
  • Proven experience as a CTO or similar leadership role

column2: IFUN Singapore Pte. Ltd. (IFUN), headquartered in Singapore, is one of the world’s quickly emerging online game companies.

In the development of games, we have been adhering to the concept of continuous innovation to entertain the public and dedicated to creating a healthy and safe entertainment games platform for players.
Since our company’s establishment, we have been working tirelessly with passion, responsibility, initiative, and an always happy belief.
As an online game product provider, we are committed to becoming a comprehensive Internet company that provides users with high-quality services such as games, entertainment, and tools.
We create for users based on the corporate spirit of user first, experience first, ambition and down-to-earth all-round happiness.

Our management philosophy is firmly focused on stimulating creativity, actively improving product quality, strengthening execution and on-going customer care whilst continuously grasping the pulse of the industry and bravely standing at the forefront of technology to meet customer needs and market demands with new and exciting products.

At IFUN our team is constantly innovating and wholeheartedly forging ahead to provide high-quality products and perfect after-sales service for users worldwide in various industries.","

Responsibilities

  • Responsible for business platform development
  • Responsible for completing system design, interface design and data modeling according to requirements, and writing corresponding technical documents
  • Ability to independently complete the core coding development of the corresponding system
  • Can independently solve difficult problems encountered in development
  • Participate in system stability, performance and scalability debugging
  • Participate in/responsible for the functional design and development of product system modules

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science or equivalent practical experience
  • 5 years of experience as Software Engineer or Software Developer or in a relevant role
  • Solid Java basic JVM, multi-threading, concurrency, high availability, and profound experience in network communication
  • Familiar with mainstream open source application frameworks, such as Spring-related, Mq, Dubbo, ZooKeeper, Redis, HBase and other development technologies
  • Familiar with relational database MySQL, etc., as well as corresponding database tuning and SQL optimization
  • Familiar with microservices, domain model design, OOD, design patterns and agile development
  • Familiar with Unix/Linux operating system and development environment, familiar with Nginx/Tomcat/Resin, etc.
  • Familiar with container-related technologies, such as Docker and kubernetes, familiar with common technologies such as distributed, caching, message mechanism, and data consistency, and apply them reasonably
  • Familiar with Hadoop ecological related technologies, proficient in kafka, hbase and other technologies

Incorporated in 1996, TechSource Systems is committed to providing quality technology solutions that empower the engineering and R&D community, providing the ultimate computing environment for technical computation and embedded deployment including design, simulation, visualization, and implementation.

As the sole distributor in Southeast Asia for MathWorks Inc, developer of the MATLAB® and Simulink® family of products, we provide organizations and businesses with a variety of the best software tools to facilitate innovations. To continue adding support to our customers especially in the area of development of embedded systems for the automotive industry, we have established a partnership with ETAS to be their exclusive distributor covering ASEAN and Australia for their hardware solutions.

We believe in value-added service and delivering solutions that enable scientific accuracy, speed, and precision. Gives our customers the advantage in the ever-changing market, to achieve precision in their design, testing, verification, implementation and embedded deployment processes that ultimately lead to desired end-results. Our clients include many research and development institutes as well as multinational companies operating in this region.

TechSource Systems currently has offices in Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, and the Philippines, with its headquarters based in Singapore. We are an ISO 9001:2008 certified company and awarded the Singapore's Outstanding Enterprise 2013 Award.

column2: MICRON SEMICONDUCTOR ASIA OPERATIONS PTE LTD is a subsidiary of Micron Technology, Inc.  (‘Micron’).

column3: Micron is a global leader in the semiconductor industry. For more than 35 years, Micron has dedicated itself to collaborating with customers and partners to engineer technology that drives innovation and transforms what’s possible.  Micron offers the industry’s broadest portfolio of silicon-to-semiconductor memory solutions—starting with foundational DRAM, NAND, and NOR Flash memory, and extending to SSDs, modules, MCPs, HMC, and other semiconductor systems. This best-in-class technology powers leading-edge computing, consumer, enterprise server and storage, networking, embedded, automotive, industrial, and mobile products.

Micron is strategically located in Singapore to efficiently and effectively accommodate its global customers, while also serving as the base of the company’s worldwide operations. Singapore is home to Micron’s largest manufacturing footprint with three fabrication facilities, an upcoming fabrication facility expansion, and a test and assembly facility. Its presence in Singapore also includes a technology center supporting innovation across the company and a sales and marketing office that offers all Micron memory products to our regional customers.

Micron provides opportunities for team members’ personal and career development through challenging work assignments, training and educational programs. We hire, train, develop, and educate a workforce that is competent in performing job expectations by providing orientation, job specific training, professional certifications, external training and various continuous learning opportunities.
As Micron enters into a new era of growth, its presence in Singapore plays an important role in its worldwide operations and overall success.

·        Develop application fixes and enhancement for existing application software.

·        Administer and resolve applications issues, provide updates and perform root cause analysis.

·        Proactively attend to alerts related to application and system services.

·        Provide 2nd / 3rd level technical support to our Helpdesk on CCN products

·        After office support on a rotational basis for application software issues and alerts.

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:

·      Tertiary education with 2 years of working experience, those without working experience are welcome to apply too.

·      Should have working experience/knowledge in the following:

a.    Programming language

·        C#.NET

·        WCF / Web API

·        Angular / React JS

·        Node Js

·        JavaScript/ Typescript

b.   Json & XML format and technology

c.    MS SQL Server 2016 or above

d.   Object-oriented design concept

e. Microsoft Workflow

·      Added advantage if you have experience / knowledge with/in

a.    Agile Scrum Development Methodology

b.   Container Development

c.    DevOps

d.    Cybersecurity

OTHER REQUIREMENTS

Candidates must be highly independent, proactive, critical thinkers with good oral and written communication and interpersonal skills

63,software,/en/job/robotics-software-engineer-9287950,9287950,Robotics Software Engineer,False,False,4400,5000,SGD,OTSAW DIGITAL PTE. LTD.,15-Mar-22,False,,,201511868R,,,1 - 50 Employees,,,"

OTSAW is a global pioneer in advanced robotics technologies and next-generation artificial intelligence for healthcare, security delivery and mobility applications to improve safety, business processes and everyday lives.

","

OTSAW Digital is seeking creative, energetic well-rounded Robotics Software Engineer to work in the field of autonomous robot technology. You will be responsible for integrating and testing software solutions in simulation and on the robot. We are looking for engineers who are interested in tackling challenging problems for our robots. At OTSAW Digital, we want people with passion. We want innovators. We want people who can collaborate and bring us a creative future. So, if you are passionate about working in a startup, want to solve hard problems and make cool robots with us, please apply.

Responsibilities:

Research and Develop OTSAW software system. The engineer will be assigned to lead initiative related to one or a few of the following domains

Perceptions

·      Improve usability, reliability and scalability for mapping and localization system.

·      Improve object detection, tracking & classification system.

·      Improve Sensor fusion algorithm for reliable, precise localization, object tracking.

Control and Planning

·      Embedded System – low level interfacing with sensors, actuators.

·      Robot control system, low-level motion planning algorithm.

·      Behaviour planning – path planning & mission control.

·      Fleet Management coordination and planning

·      Simulation – for testing of robot behaviour & path planner.

Requirements:

·      Min. education qualification: Bachelor Degree in Robotics Engineer, Computer Engineer, Electrical Engineer or other Engineering related course

·      Strong theoretical & practical experience in developing perception and/or control algorithm

·      Demonstrate deep interest & understanding in relevant domain of interest

·      Experience in developing on actual physical robot

·      Experience in C++, Python, ROS, Git
