WayUp - Top 100 Internship Program – 2020","
About our group:
This is a cohesive, innovative, and responsible team that consists of engineers with mechanical, electrical, and software backgrounds. They render services to operation to improve system performance and improve efficiency. It has robust dealing with cross function associates with technical and operational expertise to ascertain projects or tasks requirements and offer customized solutions to increase productivity, improve output and reduce defects, and yield improvement.
About the role - you will:
  • Responsibilities include software development and sustaining engineering distribution systems, island automation for media manufacturing and media FG packing for continuous operational efficiency improvement. To provide solutions and enhancements to the existing cassettes distribution systems in all 3 sites, improve productivity and maintain operations sustainability.
  • Deal with existing Omron PLC program logics, C sharp, Python, VB+ studio software with the ability to make changes or write routines.
  • To familiarize with Wet Bench Process equipment, which incorporates Ultra-Sonic, chemical etch, and mechanical abrasion system as part of the cleaning process.
  • Analyze the machine’s KPIVs, to co-relate to yield
  • Apply various analytics algorithms such as: Kruskal; Outlier; or Duplicate.
  • Using Data analytical software such as Python programming to predict component failure corresponding to yield impact
  • With this predictive tool, prevents defective parts from flowing down to the next Process step
About you:
  • Bachelor Degree in Engineering, and/or equivalent experiences
  • Software knowledge includes Python coding and C sharp programming skills.
  • Mitsubishi PLC / Omron PLC programming experience
  • Kepware/Splunk
  • Ability to write logics.
  • Data mining, analytical skill
Location:
Our Woodlands site is one of the largest electronics manufacturing sites in Singapore, housing our recording media operations. Spread over three sites, it is easily accessible via bus or from the MRT Station, with many employees taking mass-transportation to work. Ample free on-site parking is also available. Here at work, you can enjoy breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks at our on-site canteen and coffee shop. We offer a range of facilities including an in-house gym and dance studio, as well as after-work badminton and table tennis competitions. On-site celebrations and community volunteer opportunities also abound. Don’t miss our Lunar New Year Lion Dance performance or our Seagate’s Got Talent event.
Location: Woodlands, Singapore, W3
Travel: None

column4: About Nanyang Technological University, Singapore

column3: <div>

column4: A research-intensive public university, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (NTU Singapore) has 33,000 undergraduate and postgraduate students in the Engineering, Business, Science, Humanities, Arts, & Social Sciences, and Graduate colleges. It also has a medical school, the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine, established jointly with Imperial College London.

column3: <div>

column4: NTU is also home to world-class autonomous institutes – the National Institute of Education, S Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Earth Observatory of Singapore, and Singapore Centre for Environmental Life Sciences Engineering – and various leading research centres such as the Nanyang Environment & Water Research Institute (NEWRI) and Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N).

column3: <div>

column4: Ranked amongst the world’s top universities by QS, NTU has also been named the world’s top young university for the past seven years. The University’s main campus is frequently listed among the Top 15 most beautiful university campuses in the world and has 57 Green Mark-certified (equivalent to LEED-certified) buildings, of which 95% are certified Green Mark Platinum. Apart from its main campus, NTU also has a campus in Novena, Singapore’s healthcare district.

column3: <div>

column4: Under the NTU Smart Campus vision, the University harnesses the power of digital technology and tech-enabled solutions to support better learning and living experiences, the discovery of new knowledge, and the sustainability of resources.

Borries Pte. Ltd. develops and manufactures specialised scanning electron microscope dedicated to image known and unknown viruses. It can not only be used in research but also in health institutes like hospitals. We want to be part of the global effort to prevent pandemics from happening again.","

Job Description:

As a Senior System Software Engineer, you will take an active role in the equipment system development. You will be working closely with hardware/firmware engineers to develop software to support new hardware, new tools and new features for our equipment. You will carry software development through all phases of the software lifecycle and follow the Agile development methodology. This opportunity will allow you to work on a large software system and be a key contributor to our future software development for our products.

Job Responsibility:

  • Design, implementation and testing of system level software
  • Participate in software system architecture development and document software requirements and development plan
  • Perform detailed design analysis and reviews with hardware engineering team to achieve product performance, cost, reliability and manufacturability requirements
  • Track software related issues and lead resolution of issues with a well-documented and methodical approach
  • Develop software test and verification plans and protocols, and conduct prototype testing and verification testing
  • Work closely with hardware engineering team to debug/integrate software with hardware
  • Collaborate with program managers to create and manage development plans and project plans related to software development
  • An individual in this position must be able to successfully perform the essential duties and responsibilities listed above. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions of this position.

Requirement:

  • Bachelor or master’s degree in Computer Engineering, or EE
  • Solid programming skills in C/C++/C#
  • Strong data analysis and presentation skills.
  • Effective oral and written communication skills
  • Ability to work with other functional teams, especially in a multi-site environment
  • 0-4 years of application development on an equipment system

column2: The Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) is Singapore's lead public sector agency that spearheads economic oriented research to advance scientific discovery and develop innovative technology. Through open innovation, we collaborate with our partners in both the public and private sectors to benefit society.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: As a Science and Technology Organisation, A*STAR bridges the gap between academia and industry. Our research creates economic growth and jobs for Singapore, and enhances lives by contributing to societal benefits such as improving outcomes in healthcare, urban living, and sustainability.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
We play a key role in nurturing and developing a diversity of talent and leaders in our Agency and 19 biomedical sciences and physical sciences research institutes, the wider research community and industry.","
This job focuses on software development for mobile robotic systems. This includes development of core mobile robotics algorithms for fleet management and robot motion planning as well as integration of existing software packages or libraries into robotic solutions.

Responsibilities:
  • Develop algorithms and implement software solutions for robotic navigation, motion planning, fleet management and robotics middleware
  • Software development in C/C++/Python
  • Software testing, debugging and deployment
  • Hardware-software integration for developing robotics applications
  • Technical project planning and execution on development projects for global industry members
  • Must be hands-on and work well within a team of hardware and software engineers
  • Technical write up and presentation
Job Requirements
  • Bachelor or Master Degree in Robotics, Computer Science or relevant discipline
  • Programming/software development experience (GUI, drivers, Linux-based development)
  • 1-2 years software development experience using object oriented programming languages, e.g., C++, Python, Java
  • Knowledge of motion planning or control algorithms and software such as ROS/ROS2 and moveit will be advantageous.
  • Knowledge of AI algorithms for path planning and reinforcement learining and libraries such as TensorFlow, Pytorch, OpenAI Gym will be advantageous
  • Experience with robotics or control system for industrial automation will be advantageous
  • Willing to learn and adapt to new technology quickly
  • Technically motivated to solve problems, innovate and deliver on time to customers
  • Good interpersonal and communication skills
The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

  • Up to $5500, Permanent Role with AWS and 2-3 months Variable Bonus

  • Software Testing and Project Management Experiences

Responsibilities: 

  • Monitor and track system issues and risks bring it up for discussion with internal and external stakeholders.
  • Implement best practices and framework to improve from current state to increase the efficiency of project delivery.
  • Manage vendor to deliver test execution for projects, change requests and service requests on time to meet overall project goals.
  • Develop project plans which include requirements, scope, deliverables, resources, and schedules.
  • Ensure smooth transition from project delivery to operations.

  • Infrastructure Setup Testing labs at different sites for all kinds of testing such as integrated Testing, Parallel Revenue Cycle Testing, User Acceptance Testing including all required equipment.
  • Monitoring testing activities to ensure they are scheduled on time and roster preparation including testing scripts reviewed and ready

column2: DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia, with over 280 branches across 18 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS has a growing presence in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's ""AA-"" and ""Aa1"" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

522,software,/en/job/sr.-r-d-software-engineer-android-java-development-%5B134555br%5D-worknow-9391379,9391379,"Sr. R&D Software Engineer, Android & Java development --- [134555BR] #WorkNow",False,False,,,USD,Thermo Fisher Scientific,17-Mar-22,False,,30 days,200510503Z,,,More than 5000 Employees,,,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE: TMO) is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue of approximately $40 billion. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Whether our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving complex analytical challenges, increasing productivity in their laboratories, improving patient health through diagnostics or the development and manufacture of life-changing therapies, we are here to support them. Our global team of more than 100,000 colleagues delivers an unrivaled combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and pharmaceutical services through our industry-leading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services, Patheon and PPD. For more information, please visit www.thermofisher.com.","
Job Title: Senior Software Engineer
Reports to: Staff Engineer, Software R&D
Location: Marsiling (5 mins walk from Woodlands MRT / bus interchange)
How Will You Make an Impact?
We are world leading company in providing qPCR or Sequencing instruments which are used in life science research and diagnostics. You will be developing instrument control software based on the specifications.
You will have chance to work with team of engineers/researchers globally and develop solution to be used in the newly develop or existing instruments.
You need to be innovative, able to investigate, research and propose the solution independently.
What will you do?
  • You will be working with product manager, technical lead and engineers from different fields to develop and enhance existing instrument control software. You will be able to learn new technologies and apply these technologies to enhance or add new capabilities to our instruments.
  • Develop world class products and applications for the Life Sciences industry (qPCR, sequencing, etc)
  • Work independently in a cross functional team to develop software according to specifications and development standards
  • Lead small teams to complete software development projects for senior candidates
  • Work in a geographically separated team in different time zones
  • Contribute to innovation and process improvement efforts
How will you get here?
Education
  • Technical degree with 4-5 years of relevant experience as a software professional.
Experience
  • Experience in Android development.
  • Experience leading small teams successfully and completed 3-4 full cycle SW projects if you are interested in the senior positions
Knowledge, Skills, Abilities
  • Technical requirements:
  • Well-versed in object oriented programming.
  • Well-versed in Java language.
  • Familiar with Android Jetpack.
  • Familiar with MVVM design pattern.
Other requirements:
  • Excellent problem solving and troubleshooting skills
  • Experience with code management tools, for example, Git.
  • Able to write good unit test.
  • Team player and able to communicate well.
At Thermo Fisher Scientific, each one of our 70,000 extraordinary minds has a unique story to tell. Join us and contribute to our singular mission—enabling our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Apply today http://jobs.thermofisher.com
Thermo Fisher Scientific is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.

column3: <div>

column4: About Nanyang Technological University, Singapore

column3: <div>

column4: A research-intensive public university, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (NTU Singapore) has 33,000 undergraduate and postgraduate students in the Engineering, Business, Science, Humanities, Arts, & Social Sciences, and Graduate colleges. It also has a medical school, the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine, established jointly with Imperial College London.

column3: <div>

column4: NTU is also home to world-class autonomous institutes – the National Institute of Education, S Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Earth Observatory of Singapore, and Singapore Centre for Environmental Life Sciences Engineering – and various leading research centres such as the Nanyang Environment & Water Research Institute (NEWRI) and Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N).

column3: <div>

column4: Ranked amongst the world’s top universities by QS, NTU has also been named the world’s top young university for the past seven years. The University’s main campus is frequently listed among the Top 15 most beautiful university campuses in the world and has 57 Green Mark-certified (equivalent to LEED-certified) buildings, of which 95% are certified Green Mark Platinum. Apart from its main campus, NTU also has a campus in Novena, Singapore’s healthcare district.

column3: <div>

column4: Under the NTU Smart Campus vision, the University harnesses the power of digital technology and tech-enabled solutions to support better learning and living experiences, the discovery of new knowledge, and the sustainability of resources.

column3: For more information, visit www.ntu.edu.sg

A Research Associate position is available in the Rolls-Royce@NTU Corporate Laboratory, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore.
Job Description:
  • Provide technical expertise and leadership into the development of Embedded Systems technologies and solutions for different Rolls-Royce businesses
  • Maintain a good understanding of 'state-of-the-art' in Embedded Systems (hardware and firmware) Design. Actively work with suppliers to acquire the new technologies as required.
  • Develop Advanced Embedded Systems (hardware and firmware) for the controllers used in power electronics systems (e.g. Power Converters, and Energy Storage) and other sub-systems in Rolls-Royce
  • Work towards becoming a subject matter expert (SME) for Embedded Systems Design and represent the RRE-SG on Embedded Systems Design matters in internal initiatives and represent the company at appropriate external venues
  • Actively work with suppliers to acquire development (hardware and firmware) and verification tools
  • Lead R&D projects and manage cross-functional activities to deliver committed milestones, on time and within budget while meeting technical, business and customer requirements
  • Engage senior management, different Rolls-Royce businesses and functions in developing strategic R&D activities on behalf of RRE-SG
  • Co-ordinate strategic collaboration with key research partners in R&D initiatives
  • Lead internal and external research programs to ensure business opportunities are pursued and the Group's R&D requirements are satisfied
  • Maintain good customer and stakeholder engagement throughout the project cycle
  • Support the achievement of department objectives aligned with global objectives
Job Requirements:
  • Master degree in Electrical/Electronics/Computer/Software Engineering. Candidates with significant industrial and technology commercialization experience will be preferred
  • Experience in commercial solutions development i.e. from concept to final product
  • Good understanding on power electronics converters, motor drives and control methodologies (algorithms, modelling & simulation, HIL testing, MATLAB scripting, model based design) is advantageous
  • Strong technical knowledge and experience in embedded hardware design with microcontroller, DSP and FPGA is a must
  • Advanced experience in digital and analog electronics design is required including knowledge on system ADC, DAC and interface design. In general, deep interest in Electronics is required
  • Experience in developing firmware and application software in embedded ModelSim, QuestaSim, C/C++, Matlab/Simulink, HDL coder and/or Verilog/ VHDL for power electronics systems. Familiarity with user interface development using C# and/or LabVIEW is useful
  • Designing for functional safety, preferably within the aerospace/automotive/other industry (IEC61508 SIL-3, ISO26262 ASIL-D, EC61508, ISO26262, DO254 and DO178C)
  • Knowledge of MISRA C, C++ coding standards
  • Advanced understanding on trouble shooting of embedded systems and embedded firmware
  • Experience in formal verification and validation of design entities
  • Ability to work with embedded software and hardware suppliers to meet the system requirements is a must. The candidate should have a strong vendor and supplier database
  • Experience in working with different embedded controllers like ARM, DSP and/ or FPGA
  • Strong technical knowledge and experience of various serial data transfer methods: e.g. ARINC-429, MIL-STD-1553B, general asynchronous serial (e.g. UARTs), SPI. Knowledge of other communication protocols e.g. CANBus, Profibus, ModBus, Ethernet communications - UDP and TCP/IP stacks will be useful
  • Experience in designing schematics and PCBs for high speed and high voltage circuits will be advantageous
  • Exposure to EMI, EMC issues and management at board level. Experience in solving noise problems in ultra-high switching frequency converters and design of EMI/EMC filters to meet stringent requirement is useful
  • Experience in creating formal Requirements Documentation, Verification and Validation (VnV) Unit, Integration testing process and documentation. Usage of tools like DOORS, Clearquest, Clearcase
  • Experience with configuration management and software revision control such as TeamCenter, GIT, PTC Integrity etc
  • Experience in working in multi-domain team (Electrical, Mechanical, Control and Thermal). In general, you should have broad interests across engineering disciplines and a sound understanding of interactions with other engineering disciplines
  • Ability to work effectively in a multidisciplinary, global team environment
  • Effective oral and written communication skills
  • An ability to achieve targets while working on multiple projects simultaneously
  • An ability to monitor social, industrial and academic developments of technology and develop technology development plans
We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Job Description

  • Leading a team of engineers on developing embedded system for thermal control application.
  • Manage software and hardware development tasks using development management tool.
  • Design and develop embedded system (microcontroller & FPGA) for various application in semiconductor equipment.
  • Develop the system architecture base on the application. Including selection of component. FPGA/uC IC, MOSFET, resistor, etc.
  • Liaise with manufacturer on board design and specification. Ensure vendor deliver product / design that meeting requirement.
  • Design test case and perform design verification testing on the prototype to ensure design intent is met
  • Troubleshooting on the issue happen in the prototype & final application.

Job Requirement

  • Minimum Bachelor Degree in Electrical & Electronics Engineering.
  • Familiar with development project management, Scrum Sprint. 
  • Familiar with microcontroller and FPGA application.
  • Familiar with communication Interfaces – eg. I2C, SPI, CAN bus, TCP/IP,
  • Familiar with use of PCB Schematic & Layout Tools – Orcad / PADS
  • Familiar with Circuit Simulation Tools e.g. LTSPice
  • Knowledge of PCB Design Rules.
  • Knowledge of programming, C#, C++, Python, Micron Python, etc.
  • Knowledge of Safety & Regulatory Requirements.
  • Experience with at least 2 board bring up cycles.

  • Translate mockups and wireframes into functioning front-end code.
  • Write and maintain documentation for new and existing features.
  • Keep up-to-date on best practices and new technologies.
  • Rapid prototyping, and presenting conceptual design and working prototypes to management.
  • Conduct design and code reviews and collaborate to ensure your own code passes review.
  • Work with Product Management to analyze requirements.
  • Collaborate on technical architecture and design.

Requirements
  • At least 2 years of relevant experience using the following skillsets:
    Solid understanding of OOP design principles
    Visual Studio 20XX, SQL Server 20XX
    Remote debugging
    Unit Testing
  • Front-end:
    JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX
    HTML5, CSS3, Responsive Design
    Understanding of web technology stack, including HTTP, REST, cookies, caching, and asset loading
  • Back-end:
    Windows & web services, WCF, MSMQ, Signal-R 
    C# and .NET Framework
    Experience with scalable, performant design and architecture
  • Database:
    Working knowledge of SQL and relational databases
    Read and write basic SQL queries, stored procedures, views, and functions
    ADO.NET & LINQ to SQL
  • Mobile Development:
    Xamarin

534,software,/en/job/computer-integrated-manufacturing-engineer-9404456,9404456,Computer Integrated Manufacturing Engineer,False,False,4100,5740,SGD,Murata Electronics Singapore (Pte.) Ltd.,22-Mar-22,False,,30 days,197201838W,,,2001 - 5000 Employees,,,"

Murata Electronics Singapore (Pte.) Ltd. (“Murata Singapore”) is a subsidiary of Murata Manufacturing Co. Ltd. in Japan. It functions as production and sales foothold of the Murata Group in the ASEAN regions.

Murata Singapore was established in 1972 and it was one of the first factories set up by Murata outside Japan to meet the demands of the electronic components in South East Asia.

Located in three facilities in Yishun Industrial Park and 1 plant in Tuas, Murata Singapore manufactures multilayer ceramic chip capacitor and energy devices in its Singapore plants. It also covers sales in Southeast Asia and Southern Asia to support Murata Singapore's sales operations, several Overseas Sales Affiliates were established in the region, such as Thailand, Philippines, Malaysia, India and Vietnam.

","

JOB DESCRIPTION

Department: Computer Integrated Manufacturing (CIM) (MES-Tuas)

Report to: Section head

Functional Relationships with: All departments in Murata (TUAS) Singapore

KEY DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:

1. Software

  • Develop User interfaces for Modem Rich Internet Applications with the latest Front-End Technologies.
  • Develop application code and unit test in the Angular, Web Services and Java technologies.
  • Make design and technical decisions for Angular projects.
  • Ensuring high performance

2. Hardware

  • Install, configure and maintain operating systems, application software.
  • Maintain security, backup and redundancy strategies.

3. Network

  • Design and implement network solutions.
  • Maintain, configure and troubleshoot LAN/WAN/WLAN, Cisco firewalls, F5 load balancer, DNS and DHCP

ABILITY/COMPETENCY REQUIRED:

  • Degree in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering
  • Minimum 3 years of experience in Angular, Web Services and Java Technologies.
  • Strong knowledge in HTML, CSS, and writing cross-browser compatible code.
  • Hands on & implements complex Angular applications, directives, controllers, micro services
  • Strong knowledge in writing / executing SQL queries required to interact with database
  • Familiar with eclipse IDE and testing frameworks
  • Experienced in using UNIX shell scripting and Oracle PL/SQL
  • Experienced in supporting servers, operating systems (UNIX and Windows Servers)
  • Experienced in network routing protocol, STP, MSTP and Network Access Control.
  • Knowledge of Possess· Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) will be more advantageous.

column2: The Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) is Singapore's lead public sector agency that spearheads economic oriented research to advance scientific discovery and develop innovative technology. Through open innovation, we collaborate with our partners in both the public and private sectors to benefit society.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: As a Science and Technology Organisation, A*STAR bridges the gap between academia and industry. Our research creates economic growth and jobs for Singapore, and enhances lives by contributing to societal benefits such as improving outcomes in healthcare, urban living, and sustainability.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
We play a key role in nurturing and developing a diversity of talent and leaders in our Agency and 19 biomedical sciences and physical sciences research institutes, the wider research community and industry.","
Roles and Responsibilities
Design and develop embedded software for devices and systems for medical devices from requirements to production, according to ISO13485 Quality Management Systems requirements for Medical Devices and ISO14971 Application of risk management to medical devices.
  • Develop embedded software requirement specifications and conduct software risk analysis based on product requirements. 
  • Create procedures for testing and implementing software codes
  • Maintain proper documentation of design, test method, verification and validation reports, manufacturing procedures, etc.
  • Lead and work with system integrators in software implementation and testing during the pilot and production stage of development.
  • Work closely with internal teams (Marketing/Regulatory/R&D/QA/Manufacturing) to achieve project objectives.
  • Support deployment of device in market, investigate and resolve market issues / returns.
Key Requirements
  • Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or equivalent.
  • Proficient in C/C++ programming skills for microcontroller programming.
  • Demonstrate hands-on technical experience in software development in embedded environment.
  • Familiar with software development life cycles, best practices, and methodology.
  • Good knowledge of embedded system design and micro-processor architecture.
  • Possess knowledge of electronics hardware and its interfacing to software systems.
  • Familiar with software configuration tools and concepts.
  • Experience developing embedded software in accordance with ISO13485 quality management system and ISO14971 for risk management process for medical devices is highly desirable.

538,software,/en/job/full-stack-developer-r-d-169552br-worknow-9404737,9404737,Full Stack Developer (R&D) -- 169552BR #WorkNow,False,False,,,SGD,Thermo Fisher Scientific,22-Mar-22,False,,30 days,200510503Z,,,More than 5000 Employees,,,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE: TMO) is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue of approximately $40 billion. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Whether our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving complex analytical challenges, increasing productivity in their laboratories, improving patient health through diagnostics or the development and manufacture of life-changing therapies, we are here to support them. Our global team of more than 100,000 colleagues delivers an unrivaled combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and pharmaceutical services through our industry-leading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services, Patheon and PPD. For more information, please visit www.thermofisher.com.","
Location: Marsiling (5 mins walk from Woodlands MRT / bus interchange)
How Will You Make an Impact?
We are the world's leading company in providing qPCR or Sequencing instruments which are used in life science research and diagnostics. You will be developing instrument control software based on the specifications.
You will have chance to work with team of engineers/researchers globally and develop solution to be used in the newly develop or existing instruments.
You need to be innovative, able to investigate, research and propose the solution independently.
What will you do?
You will be working with product manager, technical lead and engineers from different fields to develop and enhance existing instrument control software. You will be able to learn new technologies and apply these technologies to enhance or add new capabilities to our instruments.
  • Develop world class products and applications for the Life Sciences industry (qPCR, sequencing, etc)
  • Work independently in a cross functional team to develop software according to specifications and development standards
  • Lead small teams to complete software development projects for senior candidates
  • Work in a geographically separated team in different time zones
  • Contribute to innovation and process improvement efforts
How will you get here?
Education
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or Sciences
Experience
  • 5 - 10 years of software development experience in the software industry, preferably involving hardware and software interactions. Candidates with lesser experience are welcome to apply and may be considered for a junior position
  • Experience in Web based application using Java
  • Experience leading small teams successfully and completed 3-4 full cycle SW projects if you are interested in the senior positions
Knowledge, Skills, Abilities
Technical requirements:
  • Strong with common data structures, design patterns, object-oriented design, and algorithms used in programming
  • Solid background in core Java
  • Knowledge in Python is a plus
  • Good understanding of Google Guice, Apache CXF/web stack technologies is desired
  • Previous experience developing web applications using front-end technologies like VueJS, AngularJS, Electron is a plus
Other requirements:
  • Excellent problem solving and troubleshooting skills
  • Experience with code management tools, for example, Git
  • Able to write good unit test
  • Excellent teamwork and collaboration skills
  • Ability to manage high priority tasks and adapt to changes in priorities
  • Effectively communicates and illustrates ideas; contributes critically and positively to a team
At Thermo Fisher Scientific, each one of our 100,000 extraordinary minds has a unique story to tell. Join us and contribute to our singular mission—enabling our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer.
Thermo Fisher Scientific is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.

column2:
Calling the adventurers ready to join a company that's pushing the limits of nanotechnology to keep the digital revolution rolling. At KLA, we're making technology advancements that are bigger—and tinier—than the world has ever seen. Who are we? We research, develop, and manufacture the world's most advanced inspection and measurement equipment for the semiconductor and nanoelectronics industries. We enable the digital age by pushing the boundaries of technology, creating tools capable of finding defects smaller than a wavelength of visible light. We create smarter processes so that technology leaders can manufacture high-performance chips—the kind in that phone in your pocket, the tablet on your desk and nearly every electronic device you own—faster and better. We're passionate about creating solutions that drive progress and help people do what wouldn't be possible without us. The future is calling. Will you answer?","

The successful candidate will work with a team of engineers to establish and improve tools performance through innovative solutions that include software design and implementation of subsystems, data acquisition, analysis such as signal processing, equipment simulation, and cryptographic data protection strategies. Our products are complex and data plays a major role in the maintenance of these products to meet customer expectations.

The successful candidate will be able to improve aspects of the design and suggest changes or additions to the products to make them more supportable and predictable. The candidate will drive designs that are quick to prototype and then drive toward system-level testing to prove the concept. The candidate will collaborate with a multi-disciplinary team including Systems, Software, Mechanical, Optical and Electrical engineers to prove these solutions in a timely manner.

We are looking for highly motivated self-driven individual with knowledge of data acquisition systems, design of experiments, basic statistical methods, networks, communication protocols, programming languages, and, ideally, equipment control or scientific instrumentation. The successful candidate will apply technical knowledge to real life technical problems will use data to make products better. This requires collaboration and team-work across different disciplines.

Requirements:

  • Hands-on experience programming with languages such as python, C, C++, or Java
  • Knowledge of data structures and algorithms
  • Software documentation, design, implementation, debugging and testing skills
  • Strong analytical, technical and problem-solving capabilities
  • Good communication skills, perseverance, and ability to work collaboratively within a team setting with individuals across different geographies.
  • Doctorate, Master's Level Degree, Bachelor's Level Degree

column3: IBM was established in Malaysia in June 1961 as a wholly-owned subsidiary of IBM World  Trade Corporation, one of the world’s largest and leading IT companies worldwide. IBM operates in 170 countries and employs 400,000 highly-skilled professionals.

Over the years, IBM has undergone major transformation. From a hardware company, it is today a solutions-based company and providing various services. It has also moved out of the commodity business and expanded its role to becoming a Globally Integrated Enterprise. IBM Malaysia celebrated its 50th anniversary in 2011. This was a significant milestone, marking half a century of innovation and information technology expertise contribution to Malaysia. IBM’s focus on innovation and R&D have resulted in the company’s ability to deliver value and address some of the most challenging societal, economic and technology
challenges via its smarter planet initiatives.

Smarter Planet is all about progress. IBM stands for progress. Over the years, IBM has steadfastly upheld its mission of delivering progress, undergirding it with its timeless core values -- dedication to every client’s success, innovation that matters – for our company and for the world, and trust and personal responsibility in all relationships.

IBM is committed to play a major role in cultivating the use and development of IT in Malaysia, a mission that mirrors the Government’s objective of making the country a regional and global hub of knowledge-based industries. In Malaysia, IBM has set up 19 Centers of Excellence that support global and regional operations of IBM.

The company is also heavily involved in developing local capabilities through a string of alliances. Its Business Partners represent IBM in almost all the country's industry segments. Together, IBM and its Business Partners deliver open, integrated, end-to-end solutions that help clients innovate for competitive advantage.

In an increasingly “flat” world, Malaysian companies will need a trusted business and IT partner which offers innovative solutions and services which are interconnected, instrumented and intelligent to build a smarter Malaysia. IBM is that partner.

We are an established HR Tech Company in Singapore with a growing regional presence. We are a well known local brand amongst HR professionals and our HR modules serve the needs of tens of thousands of users daily. We strive to deliver a quality product at an affordable rate via a subscription model so that all companies, regardless of their size, can afford to automate their HR processes and focus at what they do best, growing their business.
","
About The RoleWe are looking for an energetic, creative, analytical and results-driven Marketing Professional to lead our Marketing Team in growing our Singapore and regional markets. You will be working closely with the Management Team on all aspects of Marketing, focusing on creating positive Brand Perception and continual Demand Generation.
Responsibilities:
  • Build brand awareness and generate demand in target markets
  • Own and execute programs including SEO, SEM, social media campaigns, email marketing, webinars and events, partner activities, marketing automation
  • Manage content on website, blog, and social media platforms, and create new content including eBooks, videos, landing pages and case studies
  • Develop new marketing strategies and identify new channels for marketing activities
  • Closely monitor performance metrics and proactively optimize programs and processes to deliver results
  • Manage, nurture and inspire a small team of marketing executives and freelancers to achieve marketing objectives
  • Build strong partnerships with key cross-functional teams like Sales, Customer Experience and Product to identify opportunities for collaborative wins and support lead nurturing, customer communication and product marketing initiatives
  • Forecast performance, secure and allocate budget, set aggressive targets, and report on results to stakeholders across the company

Requirements:
  • Has at least 5+ years of full-funnel brand and performance marketing experience at a B2B/SaaS company with proven experience and knowledge of multiple digital marketing channels
  • preferably 2+ years of people management experience
  • Has a solid understanding of SEO, SEM, email marketing and social media marketing
  • keen interest in Digital Marketing
  • Must have analytical skills and is data driven
  • Is positive and energetic with a strong ownership mentality - from planning to execution
  • Likes being hands-on and is ready to go outside of the box to make things work
  • Learns quickly and has the ability to solve problems independently
  • Able to work in ambiguous environments, embracing change and delivering strong business outcomes

GlobalTix is a comprehensive technology solutions provider to the travel trade. Today, it is the one of the largest B2B marketplace for tours and activities in Asia, linking over 2,000 partners with more than 80,000 products from 120 cities.

GlobalTix’s cloud-based and platform agnostic e-ticket distribution platform serves to connect tourist attractions and niche services with online and offline travel agents across the globe. Its integrated solution supports attraction owners’ online sales, empowering them to meet end consumers’needs via real-time bookings and the convenience of a single, all-in-one paperless ticket.

GlobalTix solution won the Best Business Innovation Award by Singapore Tourism Board. With a passionate team, we were rewarded with the 8th fastest growing companies in Singapore in 2020 and ranked 34 in Asia-Pacific.

The company, which was launched in 2014, has offices in Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia and Philippines. It handles more than S$150 million worth of transactions on its platform annually. GlobalTix works with customers such as Singapore Airlines, Wildlife Reserves Singapore, Nerf Action Xperience, National Gallery Singapore, Kidzania Thailand, Escape Theme Park in Malaysia, Viator and TripAdvisor, among others.

column2: DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia, with over 280 branches across 18 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS has a growing presence in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's ""AA-"" and ""Aa1"" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

Associate, Specialist, Application Developer, Treasury & Markets, Technology & Operations  - (WD27253)
Business Function
Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.
Responsibilities
  • Participate in agile software development, prototyping and code reviews
  • Core Developer for a trading Web portal
  • Work closely with Product teams to collaborate and understand software requirements
  • Dynamic, motivated, hard-working, willing to try new things, always with a can-do attitude
  • Design and build unit tests, as part of test driven development
  • Provide UAT Support and carry out Deployment
Requirements
  • A Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
Back End Skills:
  • Strong understanding of Core-Java, object oriented programming and design patterns
  • Experience in Java/JVM web application development eg. Java, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Spring Security, Scala, J2EE, Relational Databases (Oracle, MSSQL, MariaDB), Java Application Servers (Apache Tomcat, Jetty, WebSphere/WebLogic)
  • Hands-on coding experience with Java 7 and Java 8, Multi-threading, OOPS, Kafka
  • Strong knowledge of Unix / Linux based systems
  • Experience in BDD/TDD
  • Micro service patterns & concepts & its application in problem solving
  • Fundamental knowledge of distributed Architectures, SOA, Micro-services, PaaS
  • Proficient in Web Protocols such as HTTP and SSL
  • Proficient in Design and Development of REST/SOAP APIs
  • Experience in concurrency techniques, writing Concurrent Applications
  • Ability to reason about performance trade-offs

Join our team and help us transform Singapore’s future through research! RySense is a research organisation dedicated to understanding what Singaporeans think, feel and do. Harnessing our passion for research excellence, we take pride in delivering quality data and in-depth insights that empower decision-making and shape a better Singapore. Our commitment to robust methodologies, timely information, and incisive recommendations distinguishes us as a centre of expertise for social trends and public opinion. We welcome people with passion for building a better future for all through meaningful work, diverse ideas, and collaborative spirit. We believe in investing in the development of our people, so that we can grow together and achieve more in this place we call home. Visit RySense’s corporate website (www.RySense.sg) to discover more about us – and to find out how you can be part of this exciting journey!","

ABOUT RYSENSE LTD

RySense is a homegrown research organisation dedicated to understanding what Singaporeans think, feel and do. Harnessing our passion for research excellence, we take pride in delivering quality data and in-depth insights that empower decision-making and shape a better Singapore. Our commitment to robust methodologies, timely information, and incisive recommendations distinguishes us as a centre of expertise for social trends and public opinion.

We welcome people with passion for building a better future for all through meaningful work, diverse ideas, and collaborative spirit. We believe in investing in the development of our people, so that we can grow together and achieve more in this place we call home.

Visit RySense’s corporate website (www.RySense.sg) to discover more about us – and to find out how you can be part of this exciting journey!


JOB SUMMARY

We are looking for an experienced Database Developer to be part of our data modernization journey.

In this role, you will design, implement, and maintain the databases and data applications, ensuring that it meets operational requirements. As the custodian of our database application systems, you will be responsible for ensuring its security, reliability, and accuracy.  

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Develop new functionalities on existing database-driven applications.
  • Maintain existing codebase include migration of legacy applications and troubleshooting of bugs.
  • Responsible for both front-end and back-end web development.
  • Participate in the technical implementation of the project discussion, codes review and architecture optimisation.  
  • Support, maintenance, and documentation of software functionality including application changes.  
  • Ensure that non-functional requirements such as security, performance, maintainability, scalability, usability, and reliability are being considered when architecting a solution.  
  • Perform data mining and analysis, extract transform & load (ETL) operations, execute data queries, generate reports, and create dashboards.
  • Maintain database dictionaries, SOPs and other relevant documentation
  • Any other ad-hoc duties as assigned. 

REQUIREMENTS

  • Possess a Degree / Diploma in Computer Science or equivalent. 
  • Possess minimum 5 years’ experience developing database driven applications with HTML/5, CSS/3, Bootstrap/4, JQuery, PHP (Laravel framework), Apache/NGINX
  • Ability to write SQL queries including T-SQL, stored procedures, and design databases in MySQL. 
  • Knowledge of database administration and operations, extract transform & load (ETL) frameworks, data warehouse concepts and business intelligence (BI) solutions 
  • Good analytical and problem-solving skill 
  • Good communication and presentation skill 
  • Team player but also able to work independently 

We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Description

Job Offer

column2: The Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) is Singapore's lead public sector agency that spearheads economic oriented research to advance scientific discovery and develop innovative technology. Through open innovation, we collaborate with our partners in both the public and private sectors to benefit society.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: As a Science and Technology Organisation, A*STAR bridges the gap between academia and industry. Our research creates economic growth and jobs for Singapore, and enhances lives by contributing to societal benefits such as improving outcomes in healthcare, urban living, and sustainability.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
We play a key role in nurturing and developing a diversity of talent and leaders in our Agency and 19 biomedical sciences and physical sciences research institutes, the wider research community and industry.","
﻿Position Summary

You will be engaged in all phases of the software development lifecycle required to design, develop, and deliver ARTC’s industrial software to our members. Your day-to-day work will primarily revolve around gathering and analyzing requirements, designing and developing software, testing and validation, debugging and modifying software to improve performance and fix defects, regularly demonstrating progress to peers, and assisting with the necessary technical requirements and documentation required.
As a Senior Software Developer, you will contribute to new software design, lead R&D projects, and have the opportunity to lead internal teams as the department grows.
  • Ability to initiate, lead, direct, and contribute to technology vision and initiatives
  • Design, develop, modify and unit test new and existing software
  • Analyze end-user market problems and requirements
  • Perform root cause analysis and implement fixes for software defects
  • Direct system testing and validation procedures
  • Contribute to product documentation
  • Practice fail-fast agile methodologies
  • Engage in peer design and implementation reviews
  • Communicate effectively with colleagues, partners, and end-users
Job Qualifications
  • Experience leading projects and teams
  • Working experience in C#/Java development is a MUST
  • Knowledge of full-stack development
  • Experience with various programming technologies (REST, JSON, Network Programming, and Security preferred)
  • Experience with various software development tools (Visual Studio, IntelliJ, Maven, GitHub, and DevOps preferred)
  • Understanding and practice with agile software development (SCRUM)
  • Familiarity with various operating systems (Windows, Linux, and macOS)
  • Familiarity with industrial automation, IIoT, analytics, and/or machine learning a plus
  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related field
  • 5+ years of professional programming experience (B2B software preferred)
The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

column7: vCargo Cloud Pte Ltd (VCC), operating under its new brand GUUD, is a leading Infocomm Technology (ICT) solution and service provider in Asia, specialising in trade and logistics-related solutions to governments and enterprises worldwide.

The Test Analyst is responsible to lead the testing of software/applications to ensure they function accordingly to specifications and clients' requirements to meet the business needs. Conducts testing using preferred organizational practices & established processes contained in the Test Methodology to ensure test objective of the project is met.

Responsibilities
 
Project Delivery
  • Understand and analyze functional requirements to prepare test plan, test cases and test design
  • Review the test cases and test plan with the project team
  • Prepare the test environment, include create test data, script test case using the auto test tool (Selenium).
  • Execute test in accordance to the test design
  • Analyze test results and work with respective teams to resolve issues such as defect open and resolution rate, bottlenecks in performance and other defects
  • Prepare test report for submission
  • Provide regular test results updates
Requirement
  • Typically 2 years’ with IT/Testing experience with knowledge of test methodology and various test tools
  • Diploma or Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Management of Information Systems or equivalent
  • Be certified in the testing area is an advantage
  • Familiar with testing methodologies and techniques
  • Experience in automated test tool, eg Selenium
  • Possess initiative and disposition with a strong commitment and orientation towards results and high quality standards
  • Team player with strong communication and interpersonal skills
  • Self-motivator with a positive attitude and with high energy
  • Proficient in written and spoken English
This is a 1-year contract role to start with

  • Direct Contract

  • MNC Compay (Government Project)

Objectives of this Role:
  • Provide technical support to existing system/database, identify flaws and create solutions to improve service uptime through monitoring and automated maintenance.
  • Examine existing systems, identify system upgrade opportunity and the best way to deliver capabilities.
  • Plan and execute full software development life cycles (SDLC) for each assigned project, adhering to company standards and expectations
  • Create proposal for technical refresh for system/database upgrades.
     
Daily and Monthly Responsibilities:
  • Design and build tools to automate system/database maintenance
  • Troubleshooting and rectification of faults reported
  • Write code to fix system bugs, and deliver with urgency and quality
  • Collaborate with maintenance team, produce project work plans and analyse the efficiency and feasibility of project operations.
  • Coordinate with development team on the bugs identified and deliver free of fault patches without compromising site reliability.
Location:
  • Ang Mo Kio HQ, Sites (Islandwide)
Working Hours:
  • Normal Office hours (Expecting Standby with Allowance)
Salary:
  • Up to $5500 depending on experiences
Requirements:
  • Bachelor’s degree in software/system engineering, computer science or information technology
  • Min 3 years’ experience in engineering software, system, database and networking platforms
  • Proven ability to document design processes, including development, tests, analytics, and troubleshooting
  • Experience with scripting, database management, system and network administration
  • Strong scripting and test automation abilities will be added advantage
  • Fresh graduate welcomed to apply as training provided
Preferred Qualifications:
  • Working knowledge of relational databases and SQL technologies
  • Experience in system setup and administrations
  • Experience in designing interactive applications and networking platforms
If you are interested, please send your resume to jason_loke@p-serv.com.sg.
You may also reach my WhatsApp at 8907 5795 for further information.
Thank you for your application and we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

column1: 564,software,/en/job/vp-application-developer-%7C-consumer-banking-group-technology-wd28051-9405989,9405989,"VP, Application Developer | Consumer Banking Group, Technology (WD28051)",False,False,,,SGD,DBS Bank Limited,23-Mar-22,False,,,196800306E,,,More than 5000 Employees,,Singapore,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia, with over 280 branches across 18 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS has a growing presence in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's ""AA-"" and ""Aa1"" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

VP, Application Developer, Consumer Banking Group, Technology & Operations - (WD28051)
Business Function
Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.
Job Responsibilities
  • Deeply interested in technology and how it can be used to solve real-world problems
  • Actively keeping yourself up to date with the latest technological trends, tools and frameworks
  • Creating complex applications, transforming user experience and the enterprise
  • Hands-on coding, initially solely responsible developing services that construct applications front to back i.e. from UX to data acquisition and repositories.
  • Responsible for assuring the technical design
  • Working in highly collaborative teams and building quality code 
  • Working with senior business and technical colleagues to rapidly deliver solutions
  • Lead technical design and architecture, particularly in service / microservice decomposition
Job Requirements
  • Minimum 7 years' hands on experience in software development and solution design.
  • Development experience in Java (including SpringBoot)
  • Development experience using Kafka,
  • Proficient in tools such as Jira, Git, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Nexus
  • Strong understanding of Distributed systems.
  • Experience working with cloud platforms (AWS, PCF)
  • Familiarity with RDBMS, preferably MariaDB, MySQL and NoSQL.
  • Demonstrable experience in event driven design and coding.
  • Experience working in Agile Methodologies ( Scrum)
  • Hunger to innovate, extend knowledge and present new ideas.
  • Good team player
Apply Now
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

column3: <div>

column4: About Nanyang Technological University, Singapore

column3: <div>

column4: A research-intensive public university, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (NTU Singapore) has 33,000 undergraduate and postgraduate students in the Engineering, Business, Science, Humanities, Arts, & Social Sciences, and Graduate colleges. It also has a medical school, the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine, established jointly with Imperial College London.

column3: <div>

column4: NTU is also home to world-class autonomous institutes – the National Institute of Education, S Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Earth Observatory of Singapore, and Singapore Centre for Environmental Life Sciences Engineering – and various leading research centres such as the Nanyang Environment & Water Research Institute (NEWRI) and Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N).

column3: <div>

column4: Ranked amongst the world’s top universities by QS, NTU has also been named the world’s top young university for the past seven years. The University’s main campus is frequently listed among the Top 15 most beautiful university campuses in the world and has 57 Green Mark-certified (equivalent to LEED-certified) buildings, of which 95% are certified Green Mark Platinum. Apart from its main campus, NTU also has a campus in Novena, Singapore’s healthcare district.

column3: <div>

column4: Under the NTU Smart Campus vision, the University harnesses the power of digital technology and tech-enabled solutions to support better learning and living experiences, the discovery of new knowledge, and the sustainability of resources.

column3: For more information, visit www.ntu.edu.sg

Job Description

Senior Associate / Associate, FullStack Developer, Group Consumer Banking and Big Data Analytics Technology, Technology and Operations - (WD21891)
Business Function
Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.
Responsibilities 
  • Design and develop as the NextGen API as per standards and practices defined.
  • Design high performance large scale system architecture, and promote industry best practices, with stability, scalability, performance, and security in mind.
  • Be the tech champion in the team, and cultivate an engineering culture.
  • Provide design documentation, unit test cases preparation and execution.
  • Responsible to ensure the changes are deployed in production and support for user live verification.
  • Ensure defect free coding and deployment.
  • Provide post-production support.
  • Should be able to guide other developers.
  • Should be able to work as part of Agile delivery.
  • Good communication and stakeholder management skill and able to speak up and freely interact with other teams, user etc.
  • Have a continuous improvement mindset.
  • Take part in software design activities & discussions.
  • Write production quality code.
  • Improve developer experience by adopting tools and policies that raise productivity for the entire engineering organization.
  • Help deliver software that positively impacts multiple teams with sweeping improvements.
  • Own the team's output, taking responsibility for everyone's performance.
Requirements
  • BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or a related subject.
  • Comfortable with practicing TDD and pair programming.
  • Well versed in DevOps approach and concepts
  • Good knowledge on Object Oriented design principles.
  • Good knowledge of functional programming design principles.
  • Good knowledge on Java standard library.
  • Hands on experience with Object Oriented programming.
  • Hands on experience with Spring and/or Spring Boot is a big plus.
  • Experience in agile software development is a plus.
  • Knowledge on Linux is a plus.
  • Knowledge on cloud platforms is a plus.
Apply Now 
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

column2: DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia, with over 280 branches across 18 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS has a growing presence in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's ""AA-"" and ""Aa1"" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

BIGO TECHNOLOGY PTE. LTD. is a fast-growing Internet company established in Singapore. We focus on live-streaming broadcast and VoIP related product and services all over the world. As an innovative internet company, BIGO TECHNOLOGY PTE. LTD. owns over 40 patents in VoIP/Video technology.

BIGO has already set up our overseas offices in Thailand, Indonesia, India, Vietnam, Philippines, Malaysia, Egypt and many other countries. More than 80% of our employees are engineers and 73% of the team holds master's degree.

Our leading mobile video broadcast product in Thailand - BIGO LIVE has attracted Thailand's most active young & fashion people together to share their interests. Initial launched in March 2016, BIGO LIVE became the most popular App and ranked #1 in Apple App Store and Google Play in Thailand market since launch.

We are still moving forward to other countries and areas to meet our goal of ‘Bring Fashion to LIVE’. Our long term vision is to build a brand new LIVE based social community in the world. We hope everyone can share their moments everywhere and anytime in a much easier way.

column2: Esker is a worldwide leader in AI-driven process automation software, helping financial and customer service departments digitally transform their procure-to-pay (P2P) and order-to-cash (O2C) cycles. Used by more than 6,000 companies worldwide, Esker’s solutions incorporate artificial intelligence (AI) technology to drive increased productivity, enhanced visibility, reduced fraud risk, and improved collaboration with customers, suppliers and internally. Founded in 1985, Esker operates in North America, Latin America, Europe and Asia Pacific with global headquarters in Lyon, France, and U.S. headquarters in Madison, Wisconsin. In 2021, Esker generated 133 million euros in total sales revenue.

At Esker, our mission is to create an environment where good work gets noticed and employee well-being is taken seriously. If you thrive in working at a place where you can freely innovate, showcase your creativity, enjoy exchanging ideas with likeminded colleagues for continuous improvement of work efficiency and solutions for our customers, we like to hear from you.  ","

Development Consultant (Based in Singapore)

The Development Consultant will play a key role in the implementation team to work with clients to gather requirements and implement the Esker Web-based document management solutions.

Key Tasks/Duties

  • Work as part of a team to implement Esker’s SaaS solutions
  • Utilize a variety of technologies to customize the Esker solutions such as end-user interface, reports and workflow to meet client business requirements
  • Work closely with clients to define requirements, test the application and train end users
  • Create and execute test cases to validate development and product configurations 
  • Configure to integrate with customer ERP systems or external applications
  • Document product configurations for clients 
  • Trouble-shoot issues that arise in the course of configuring solutions and ensure these issues are ultimately resolved to the satisfaction of the project manager/team lead
  • Work with sales, research & development and technical support teams to resolve issues for clients 
  • Identify improvements to our solutions, processes or supporting documentation
  • Majority of time is dedicated to development and customization of Esker solutions to meet client business requirements

Educational Requirements

  • Degree in Computer Science, Math, Engineering, or related experience

Required Work Experience:

  • At least 2 years of experience in software development or implementation.
  • Exposure in coding using Javascript is a must

·   

Technical Knowledge

  • Candidates with exposure in Agile Methodology, Object Oriented Programming, Relational Databases (Oracle, DB2, SQL Server), XML, JavaScript, ASP .NET, C#, SAP and/or VB experience a plus

Other Skills & Abilities

  • Understanding and business knowledge of accounting and finance a plus
  • Ability to work as part of a team or independently to meet project goals
  • Excellent verbal, written communication, interpersonal and presentation skills
  • Ability and flexibility to travel (domestic and/or international) when situation permits

Languages

  • Fluent in English

580,software,/en/job/senior-engineer-9406081,9406081,Senior Engineer,False,False,,,SGD,Nuvoton Technology Singapore Pte. Ltd.,23-Mar-22,False,,,202009793E,,,51 - 200 Employees,,Bedok South Road,"

Nuvoton Technology Corporation (NTC) was founded to bring innovative semiconductor solutions to the market. NTC was spun-off as a Winbond Electronics affiliate in July 2008 and went public in September 2010 on the Taiwan Stock Exchange (TSE). Nuvoton Technology focuses on the developments of microcontroller, microprocessor, smart home and cloud security IC and has strong market share in Industrial, Consumer and Computer markets. Nuvoton owns a wafer fab, featuring customized processes for analog and power products. Besides in-house IC products, the wafer fab also provides part of its capacity for foundry services. Nuvoton Technology provides products with a high performance/cost ratio for its customers by leveraging flexible technology, advanced design capability, and integration of digital and analog technologies. Nuvoton values long term relationships with its partners and customers and is dedicated to continuous innovation of its products, processes, and services. The company has established subsidiaries in the USA, China, Israel, India, Singapore, Korea and Japan to strengthen regional customer support and global management.

On 1st September 2020, Nuvoton Technology Singapore Pte Ltd (NTSG) was established in Singapore. Our Product Applications are - Automotive electric vehicle, Electric bikes, Energy storage system, Servers, 4/8K display, AR/VR headset, Inverter aircon/fridge/washing machine, Automotive cluster/HUD/Electric mirror, Robot/Industrial machine vision, Automotive image sensing, etc

NTSG activities aim to expand NTC group business to worldwide in the Battery Application, Spatial Sensing, Edge AI and Asian Outsource Assembly & Test commissioned control.

Our esteemed client is looking for a Principal Software Engineer who will be responsible for the following primary functions:
Responsibilities:

• Support the end-to-end application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release and support/maintenance)
• Gather project requirements, design specifications, conceptualise approach / framework, and breakdown tasks for agile team
• Mentor the junior engineers with code reviews and feedback sessions to support their technical development.
• Create standards to ensure high quality and clean code and ensure compliance within the team
• Implement testing procedures using testing tools, libraries and databases
• Troubleshoot and debug complex technical issues
• Develop roadmap for high performing, scalable, reliable and secure services
• Research and recommend new technologies to scale up productivity and efficiency
• Ensure all applications (new and legacy) meet and maintained according to quality standards
• Collaborate in cross-functional teams, such as contributing technical recommendations, identify resource requirements, and designing development approach etc.
Requirements:

• Possess a Bachelor in Computer Science or equivalent with at least 5 years of working experience in related field is required
• Strong team player and takes pride in delivering quality solutions
• Proficient in Unity, C# or Java
• Able to manage agile and waterfall projects
• Able to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
• Able to measure, manage and clear technical debt
• Proven track record of designing, building and maintaining scalable systems
• Experience in one of the cloud platforms (e.g. Azure, AWS or Google) and have built systems using one of the cloud platforms
• Experience working with QA, test environments and secure deployment
• Experience with version control (e.g. Git)
• Experience with client / server side programming
• Experience in network and TCP / UDP Sockets programming
• Experience in designing sustainable APIs
• Experience in Docker-based containers, micro-services, and Kubernetes
• Good understanding of DevOps practices and have used them to build CI/CD pipelines for software deployment
• Good understanding of development and tools for Android and iOS
Interested candidate who wish to apply for the advertised position, please click on “Apply Now”. Alternatively, you may email us an updated copy of your resume (ATTN: JIAP)  for a confidential discussion. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
