column2:
Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE: TMO) is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue of approximately $40 billion. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Whether our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving complex analytical challenges, increasing productivity in their laboratories, improving patient health through diagnostics or the development and manufacture of life-changing therapies, we are here to support them. Our global team of more than 100,000 colleagues delivers an unrivaled combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and pharmaceutical services through our industry-leading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services, Patheon and PPD. For more information, please visit www.thermofisher.com.","
How will you make an impact?
When you’re part of the team at Thermo Fisher Scientific, you’ll do important work, like helping customers in finding cures for cancer, protecting the environment or making sure our food is safe. Your work will have real-world impact, and you’ll be supported in achieving your career goals.
What will you do?
  • Responsible for requirements analysis, design, development, implementation, and unit testing of software
  • Lead team members to complete software development projects
  • Work independently in a cross-functional team to develop software per specifications and development standards
  • Understand business needs, analyze workflows, and carry out integrations across different sub-system components
How will you get here?
  • Individuals with a bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or Sciences. Master’s or higher degree is great, but not required for the position
  • 5 - 10 years of software development experience in the software industry, preferably involving hardware and software interactions
  • Candidates with lesser experience are welcome to apply and may be considered for a junior position
Knowledge, Skills, Abilities
  • Strong with common data structures, design patterns, object-oriented design and algorithms used in programming
  • Solid background in core Java
  • Good understanding of web application software technologies stack
  • Previous experience working with clinical workflows is a plus
  • Excellent teamwork and collaboration skills. Ability to manage high-priority tasks and adapt to changes in priorities
  • Effectively communicates and illustrate ideas; contributes critically and positively to a team

column1: 820,software,/en/job/research-associate-software-and-hardware-development-r00002203-9380731,9380731,Research Associate (Software and Hardware Development) - R00002203,False,False,,,SGD,Nanyang Technological University,14-Mar-22,False,,30 days,200604393R,,,More than 5000 Employees,,,"<div>

column3: <div>

column4: About Nanyang Technological University, Singapore

column3: <div>

column4: A research-intensive public university, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (NTU Singapore) has 33,000 undergraduate and postgraduate students in the Engineering, Business, Science, Humanities, Arts, & Social Sciences, and Graduate colleges. It also has a medical school, the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine, established jointly with Imperial College London.

column3: <div>

column4: NTU is also home to world-class autonomous institutes – the National Institute of Education, S Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Earth Observatory of Singapore, and Singapore Centre for Environmental Life Sciences Engineering – and various leading research centres such as the Nanyang Environment & Water Research Institute (NEWRI) and Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N).

column3: <div>

column4: Ranked amongst the world’s top universities by QS, NTU has also been named the world’s top young university for the past seven years. The University’s main campus is frequently listed among the Top 15 most beautiful university campuses in the world and has 57 Green Mark-certified (equivalent to LEED-certified) buildings, of which 95% are certified Green Mark Platinum. Apart from its main campus, NTU also has a campus in Novena, Singapore’s healthcare district.

column3: <div>

column4: Under the NTU Smart Campus vision, the University harnesses the power of digital technology and tech-enabled solutions to support better learning and living experiences, the discovery of new knowledge, and the sustainability of resources.

column3: For more information, visit www.ntu.edu.sg

Our client is a European MNC, specializing in the latest technology related to automotive technology. 
Job Description
• Analyze customer function, HW design or system design requirements and create or update software requirement specification accordingly
• Design innovative and robust software that meets Software requirement
• Specification.
• Implement software modules under guidelines of automotive embedded SW and IB&S Software Coding & Design Rules.
• Validate software design, module interface and module functionality on Test Bench and fill up test reports
• Organize and hold design peer reviews or architecture reviews with SW Architects.
• Communication and cooperation with team members to identify and implement development improvement activities.
• Support EE engineering team with implementation of test software according to their needs.
• Support System engineering team on the performance of functional tests on System Bench.
• Analyze Software Workpackages from Software Technical Project Leaders and give commitment to workpackages in terms of quality, time and cost.
• Attend and participate in regular software project meetings to give status update of workpackage.
• Participate in requirement and test specification reviews with Requirement Engineers, Software Technical Project Leaders and Test Engineers.
• Budgets Responsible for Software Work package on quality, timing and cost.


Job Requirements
• Knowledge on Automotive Embeded C Programming/ Coding Rules
• Knowledge on I B&S Software Development Process and SW configuration management system (CM synergy, MKS…)
• Knowledge on test equipment (oscilloscopes, BDM, Emulator, CANoe etc.)
• Fluent / advanced level in written and spoken English
• Effective Communication, correct understanding & clear presentation
• Commitment to Quality, Timing and Cost of his software workpackage
• Understanding of Semiconductor Specifications for HW components and HW design schematics
• Experience in embedded and real time programming and related microcontroller architecture
• Masters or Bachelor Engineering Degree
• Demonstrated capability of resolving technical problem / workpackages
• Good self-management.
• Ability to effectively work within a global organization

column1: 824,software,/en/job/software-programmer-9271802,9271802,Software Programmer,False,False,3000,5000,SGD,XII BRAVES Pte Ltd,12-Mar-22,False,,10 days,201436116D,,,51 - 200 Employees,,,"<div>

column2: XII Braves is a mobile social game studio based in Singapore, with its goal on providing World-class entertainment and excitement to the global market.

In recent years, with the widespread popularity of smartphones and mobile devices, the demand for mobile games has never been greater. This has opened many doors and new exciting forms of entertainment to audiences. XII Braves, located in Singapore, serves as a HQ for the core development, creation and launch pad to bring its products to audiences around the world. We have also established overseas support teams for game operations and additional production. As an organization with many industry veterans, we are looking for highly motivated and self-driven individuals to be part of our elite team.","

Software Programmer

Full time, Permanent Role

  • Comes with 13-mth Annual Wage Supplement & variable bonus
  • Free office snacks & drinks
  • Company provides Group Health & Surgical/Outpatient Medical Benefits
  • Location: Pasir Panjang (nearby MRT station)
  • Hybrid work-model (mixture of work-from-home and work-from-office days)
  • Mobile Game Development Company
  • Mon to Fri, 10am to 7pm

Job Description:

XII Braves is currently looking for a Mobile Games Software Developer (Programmer) to help us in maintaining current game such as Shining Beyond, or to assist with developing awesome mobile games.

This position will be a multifaceted role with various functions ranging from user interface(UI) development, gameplay implementation to graphics programming.

The candidate will be working closely with our team of engineers, game designers and artists to craft enjoyable experiences for millions of players.

Job Requirements:

  • At least 1 to 6 years of relevant client engineer / game developer / software developer relevant and related experience
  • Able to work overtime (OT) as and when needed due to business requirements
  • Possess Computer Science or related Diploma / Degree or equivalent experience
  • Strong understanding of CS fundamentals and current development methodologies, patterns and best practices
  • Experience with Unity and C#
  • Design, write and maintain high quality code
  • Able to test, debug and optimise existing code base and game features
  • Able to multitask and take on many different areas of development
  • Able to work as part of a team
  • Good communication skills
  • Passion for making and playing mobile games

Bonus to possess:

  • Previous experience shipping and supporting mobile game titles
  • Development experience for iOS and Android
  • Experience with version control systems
  • Familiar with implementing client / server architecture

EA Licence number: 20S0283","
Our client is a multinational company and a leading provider of payment solutions and services for a wide range of clients ranging from issuers, card processors, Ecommerce , mobile network operators, basically covering the entire payment value chain. 
Our client has offices located in major business centres (Africa, Europe, Asia, Middle East), and their services are being used by more than 450 institutions in over 90 countries.
This role is based in its Singapore office with 10 headcount, looking to grow into 40 by end of the year. 
Due to expansion, our client is recruiting for multiple implementation specialists to join their team. 
This is a great opportunity to move into the E-payment system space. This role make customizations based on client requirements on projects and hence do not need to develop a software product from scratch.
Responsibilities:
• Engage in the all-in-one consulting experience: All the way from speaking to clients, assisting in pre-sales opportunities to designing, programming, testing, dazzling clients with snazzy and innovative demos, receiving sign offs and deploying – you will have the opportunity to be involved in the various stages and create value for client delivery
• Become a Subject Matter Expert: Build your technical know-hows, functional skills and expertise as part of our pool of Subject-Matter Experts
• Develop training and public speaking skills: Training and coaching juniors, peers and even seniors
Requirements:
• Experience in Application Programming, System Integration, UX Design and/or Development Work as well as basic knowledge in SQL, Java, C++ , C# or Shell scripting ( Any programming skill )
• Confident in communicating with different teammates and stakeholders as well as have strong stakeholder management skills
• You understand the importance of working as a team and enjoy collaborating cross-functionally to accomplish shared goals, and you care about learning, growing, and helping others to do the same.
• You turn problems, challenges and failures into opportunities for finding lessons and disruptive solutions that create value for our clients.
• You care about business value/impact and prioritize projects accordingly. You balance innovativity and flexibility with accountability and responsibility.
Interested applicants, please send your resume or click ""Apply""
• Email: jonathan.ng@newbridgealliance.com

Regret to inform only shortlisted candidates will be notified.Jonathan Ng Yih Hau  黄奕豪 (R1332294)

column2: DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia, with over 280 branches across 18 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS has a growing presence in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's ""AA-"" and ""Aa1"" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

","
Business Function 

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble, and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels. 
Job Purpose
  • Responsible with the entire development process (technical analysis, design, development, testing and implementation).
  • Team effort coordination, dependencies management.
  • Establish best practices for coding standards and code review process.
  • Key decision maker in frameworks and architecture.
Responsibilities
Key Accountabilities
  • Deliver digital process initiative project in DBS across all countries
  • Strategic Project Governance
    • Work closely with and manage project managers from each domain, team members, tech, and stakeholders to monitoring, develop and execute project plans and associated project content.

    • Track project milestones and deliverables. Implement and track key milestones & relevant KPIs to measure success of projects.

    • Keep management and project sponsors abreast of project developments - set up periodic reviews and prepare relevant documents to communicate progress.
  • Drive project and program delivery
    • Responsible for ensuring project delivery on time on schedule and with quality

    • Effectively communicate with team members and stakeholders in a timely and clear fashion.

    • Identify and resolve issues and conflicts within the program, projects and project management community and with other stakeholders if necessary.

    • Resolve issues at the project or line level and escalate issues which cannot be resolved in a timely and accurate manner.
  • Manage key stakeholders and business and technology leads
    • Manage and communicate effectively with domain leads at senior level and working level teams.

    • Responsible for ensuring project steering committee meetings, cross function meetings and other key project meetings are effective and achieve objectives on a consistent manner.
  • Change management
    • Ability to drive the adoption of agile methodology across teams

    • Able to work with users to drive changes within the organization for projects implementation

    • Develop best practices and tools for project execution and management. Ensure utilization of standards and practices across all projects.
Key Responsibilities
  • To evaluate the user requirement with BA and Development team and come out the schedule and feasibility.
  • To have good understanding of the bank systems and where are the data located when needed
  • Manage the project with the approved cost and agree scheduled
  • Establish best practices for coding standards and code review process.
  • Make collaborative decision on system framework design
Requirements
  • At least 15 years of solid experience working in a banking / financial institution in project management office and financial management.
  • Excellent presentation, analytical and articulation skills
  • Self-starter and extremely hands on in the management of projects
  • Must have implemented large programs using Agile methodology
  • Demonstrated interaction and working with all levels of management.
  • Project management and agile certifications (e.g. PMP, scrum master etc.) will be a plus.
  • Experience in using a project management tool like HP PPM, CA PPM.
  • Knowledge/understanding of latest cloud technologies 
  • Proficiency in Slack, Microsoft Project, Visio, PowerPoint, Excel, SharePoint 2013, JIRA and Confluence
  • Ability to communicate well in English. Regional dialects such as Cantonese, Mandarin and Bahasa Indonesia / Bahasa m\ will be desirable as this position interacts regularly with the regional team
  • Experience in Data projects would be favourable
  • Strong communication skills, able to communicate effectively at all levels, and both internally and externally. Concise and precise.
  • Experience with cloud computing preferred.
Apply Now
 We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

column3: <div>

column4: About Nanyang Technological University, Singapore

column3: <div>

column4: A research-intensive public university, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (NTU Singapore) has 33,000 undergraduate and postgraduate students in the Engineering, Business, Science, Humanities, Arts, & Social Sciences, and Graduate colleges. It also has a medical school, the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine, established jointly with Imperial College London.

column3: <div>

column4: NTU is also home to world-class autonomous institutes – the National Institute of Education, S Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Earth Observatory of Singapore, and Singapore Centre for Environmental Life Sciences Engineering – and various leading research centres such as the Nanyang Environment & Water Research Institute (NEWRI) and Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N).

column3: <div>

column4: Ranked amongst the world’s top universities by QS, NTU has also been named the world’s top young university for the past seven years. The University’s main campus is frequently listed among the Top 15 most beautiful university campuses in the world and has 57 Green Mark-certified (equivalent to LEED-certified) buildings, of which 95% are certified Green Mark Platinum. Apart from its main campus, NTU also has a campus in Novena, Singapore’s healthcare district.

column3: <div>

column4: Under the NTU Smart Campus vision, the University harnesses the power of digital technology and tech-enabled solutions to support better learning and living experiences, the discovery of new knowledge, and the sustainability of resources.

column3: For more information, visit www.ntu.edu.sg

830,software,/en/job/senior-software-developer-full-stack-9323091,9323091,Senior Software Developer - Full stack,False,False,6000,9500,SGD,Toshiba Global Commerce Solutions,13-Mar-22,False,,,201219182N,,,51 - 200 Employees,,Chai Chee,"
Toshiba Global Commerce Solutions (TGCS) is a retail’s first choice for integrated in-store solutions. The leading supplier of point-of-sale systems with a worldwide install base larger than any three major competitors combined, Toshiba is committed to delivering innovative commerce solutions that transform checkout, provide seamless consumer interactions and optimize retail operations. With a global team of dedicated business partners, Toshiba provides end-to-end solutions, service and support that help clients meet virtually any retail technology need.

","

The Senior Software Developer designs, builds, and supports custom software solutions for some of the world’s largest retailers.

Our developers are often involved in the entire project lifecycle: they interact directly with our retail customers to understand and document requirements; they collaborate with the implementation and test teams on design and development; and, they oversee delivery and provide ongoing support for their work.

Retailers continue to evolve the shopping experience through technology, so our work is ever-changing and challenging. If you have a passion for high-quality software and outstanding customer service, come join our talented team and build exciting new experiences that will touch people every day!

Responsibilities

The ideal candidate will excel in our fast-paced, collaborative, customer-first environment and will contribute in a variety of ways, including:

  • Providing technical guidance during requirements workshops with our customers
  • Authoring functional specifications and/or high-level designs
  • Developing new custom function and assisting with defect support
  • Extending the automation / continuous integration platform, including tests
  • Closely working with the QA team to ensure a quality deliverable
  • Providing configuration, installation, and ongoing maintenance support
  • Mentoring of junior team members
  • Occasional travel to a customer site may be required.

Required Skills & Experience

  • A Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent professional experience
  • Exceptional written and verbal communication
  • 10+ years of working experience in the following languages: Java, ReactJS, Springboot
  • Proven experience in web front & back end application development
  • Be familiar with source control system such as Git
  • Working knowledge of databases such as MS SQL, Postgres, Mongo DB, etc
  • Computer science fundamentals including object-oriented concepts, data structures and related algorithms
  • Familiarity with the software engineering lifecycle and methodologies
  • Windows- and Linux-based operating systems, including software installation, light administration and simple scripting

Preferred Skills & Experience

  • An interest in direct communication with customers, including non-technical audiences
  • Familiarity with retail concepts and/or applications
  • Experience with retail POS applications and devices
  • A Master of Science degree in Information Systems, Computer Science or a related field

Senior Associate, Murex Integration Developer, Technology & Operations - (WD32428)
Business Function
Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.
Responsibilities
  • Build, test and deploy interfaces in Murex MxML for all asset classes by integrating with internal and external applications
  • Build, test and deploy reports in Murex datamart, market data, SQL extractions
  • Build test and deploy Murex pretrade rules, MDRS, Static data
  • Continually create, improve and re-engineering Build and Delivery Pipelines, CI/CD workflows, build and deployment based on automation scripts
  • Design, develop and maintain the interfaces from internal and external applications and optimize the existing workflows across multiple systems.
  • Work closely with teams building microservices and cloud applications that integrate with Murex. Provide the functional and technical design to integrate with Murex
  • Optimize and migrate the existing applications to the modern technology platform
  • Use dev-ops tools and frameworks to monitor applications and build recovery processes
  • Collaborate well with other team members and stakeholders in a kanban team
  • Collaborate with cross functional teams through agile frameworks and provide transparency in the daily tasks to higher management
Requirements
  • 8+ years of proven experience working with various Murex modules such as MxML Exchange, Datamart, pre-trade scripting, market data, static data etc.
  • Strong Financial domain knowledge in Capital Markets across all asset classes (Foreign Exchange, Fixed Income, Interest rate/ OTC derivatives
  • Good knowledge of an Object Oriented Programming language such as Java or scripting language such as Python
  • Good knowledge of Sybase Database and PL/SQL scripting
  • Knowledge of technologies such as ISMQ, Kafka, ELK, Spring, Camel, Redis etc is desirable

  • Experience with working in DevOps and Agile frameworks
  • Experience working with AWS is preferred but not mandatory

  • Good understanding of architectural principles, multi-threaded applications and STP processing.
  • Excellent team player
  • Highly pragmatic and delivery focused, “can do” attitude
  • Takes ownership for delivery and is a self-starter

834,software,/en/job/senior-web-developer-9369794,9369794,Senior Web Developer,False,False,5000,7000,SGD,Infotect Security Pte. Ltd.,19-Mar-22,False,,26 days,201020841W,,,1 - 50 Employees,,,"

iNFOTECT is a pioneer in providing information leakage protection and malware containment solutions for Internet-facing web servers. Our solutions effectively protect against leakages of personal, medical and financial records, server configuration information as well as intellectual properties. Our solutions also detect malicious or compromised content in public web sites and prevent it from being spread to unknowing site visitors.

Web servers are accessible to the public 24 x 7, hence they have the greatest exposure to information leakage and are most susceptible to being used for malware attacks. Currently, existing web security solutions are not effective in protecting against such risks.

iNFOTECT has stayed ahead of the curve in product innovation and continues to enhance overall web server security for our clients by preventing accidental or deliberate information leaks and malware propagation via their web servers.

We capitalize on our patented technologies to help our clients protect their brand and reputation, and avoid regulatory penalties and customer backlash that can arise from information leakage and malware propagation, thereby preserving their corporate image and competitive advantages.

","Job Requirements
  • Candidate must possess at least a Diploma or Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication) or equivalent.
  • Required skill(s): JavaScript, CSS and Java
  • Expertise in other programming languages are advantageous.
  • Multiple full-time positions are available.
  • Minimum 3 year experience in front-end development

Job Description

  • Be a senior member of the product development team
  • Enhance existing security products and develop new innovative security products.
  • Learn how to work independently and in a team.

column7: M1, a subsidiary of Keppel Corporation, is Singapore’s first digital network operator, providing a suite of communications services, including mobile, fixed line and fibre offerings, to over two million customers. Since the launch of commercial services in 1997, we have achieved many firsts – becoming one of the first operators to be awarded one of Singapore’s two nationwide 5G standalone network license, first operator to offer nationwide 4G service, as well as ultra high-speed fixed broadband, fixed voice and other services on the Next Generation Nationwide Broadband Network (NGNBN).

We offer a wide range of mobile and fixed communication services to our consumers, and deliver an extensive suite of services and solutions to our corporate customers which includes symmetrical connectivity solutions of up to 10Gbps, managed services, cloud solutions, cybersecurity solutions, Internet of Things and data centre services.

We collaborate closely with our shareholders Keppel Corporation and Singapore Press Holdings Limited to achieve operational synergies that strengthen our position as an established communications provider in the market.
Our mission is to drive transformation and evolution in Singapore’s telecommunications landscape through cutting-edge technology and made-to-measure offerings.

The ideal candidate must be keen to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment.   • Bachelor’s Degree in computer science or equivalent experience

  • Able to work independently and communicate with different level in the organisation

Willowglen Services Pte Ltd (“WSPL”) was established in Singapore, in the year of 1986 with a paid out capital SGD $2,000,002. The company was established with a primary purpose to provide SCADA products & integrated SCADA, Security & IT solutions for our local & regional customers. WSPL is a leading SCADA company who has more than 30 years of experiences to design, customize, implement inclusive maintenance, to turnkey integrated SCADA, Security & IT solutions for various industries such as for the water & power utilities sectors, oil/gas production & distribution, building & facilities, security, transport, telecommunication and IT sector. WSPL is a subsidiary of Willowglen Group of companies and with its corporate headquarter & R&D center - Willowglen MSC Berhad, a public-listed company located in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. With more than 30 years of experience. Willowglen’s capability goes beyond scada and its related solutions. We are an ISO 9001 and OHSAS 18001:2007 certified company that is continuously evolving and innovating. With the implementation of international standards and quality, Our team recognizes the importance in accommodating rapidly changing business requirements, and also the increase demand in productivity. Willowglen Strength and Services   R&D   Maintenance Support   Engineering   Project Management","

column3: IBM was established in Malaysia in June 1961 as a wholly-owned subsidiary of IBM World  Trade Corporation, one of the world’s largest and leading IT companies worldwide. IBM operates in 170 countries and employs 400,000 highly-skilled professionals.

Over the years, IBM has undergone major transformation. From a hardware company, it is today a solutions-based company and providing various services. It has also moved out of the commodity business and expanded its role to becoming a Globally Integrated Enterprise. IBM Malaysia celebrated its 50th anniversary in 2011. This was a significant milestone, marking half a century of innovation and information technology expertise contribution to Malaysia. IBM’s focus on innovation and R&D have resulted in the company’s ability to deliver value and address some of the most challenging societal, economic and technology
challenges via its smarter planet initiatives.

Smarter Planet is all about progress. IBM stands for progress. Over the years, IBM has steadfastly upheld its mission of delivering progress, undergirding it with its timeless core values -- dedication to every client’s success, innovation that matters – for our company and for the world, and trust and personal responsibility in all relationships.

IBM is committed to play a major role in cultivating the use and development of IT in Malaysia, a mission that mirrors the Government’s objective of making the country a regional and global hub of knowledge-based industries. In Malaysia, IBM has set up 19 Centers of Excellence that support global and regional operations of IBM.

The company is also heavily involved in developing local capabilities through a string of alliances. Its Business Partners represent IBM in almost all the country's industry segments. Together, IBM and its Business Partners deliver open, integrated, end-to-end solutions that help clients innovate for competitive advantage.

In an increasingly “flat” world, Malaysian companies will need a trusted business and IT partner which offers innovative solutions and services which are interconnected, instrumented and intelligent to build a smarter Malaysia. IBM is that partner.

Responsibilities:
  • Automate and containerize all the existing and new service in ATLAS into an micro service and deploy in open shift platform. 

Skillset (Must have)﻿﻿
  • Expertise in App Containerization technology Docker, creating Docker images, Containers, Docker Registry to store images, cloud-based registry Docker Hub, Docker Swarm to manage containers.
  • Experience in deployment automation of all the Microservices to pull the image from the private Docker Registry and deployed into Docker Swarm to create a complete docker cluster by using Ansible.
  • Experience in managing Kubernetes charts using Helm. Creating reproducible builds of the Kubernetes applications, managed manifest files and releases of Helm packages. Created Pods in Kubernetes and monitored the health of pods using Helm charts.
  • Experience in working on NoSQL database MongoDB to Replica setup and sharing, and managing Replica set.

Skillset (Good to have)
  • Experience in implementing CI/CD for Micro services Architecture Environment (NodeJS, .Net Core, Zookeeper, Kafka, Redis ) using Jenkins, Anthill Pro and UDeploy.
  • Experience in using Jenkins with SonarQube to analzse and get the better quality of the source code.
  • Experience in working with RedHat OpenShift Container Platform for Docker and Kubernetes, using Kubernetes to manage containerized applications with its nodes, ConfigMaps, node-selector, Services and deployed application containers as Pods.
  • Expertise in LINUX / UNIX system builds, administration, installations, upgrades, troubleshooting on different distributions such as Ubuntu, CentOS, RHEL 5.x/6.X/7. X. Expertise in creating Exception Group policies for Windows Server 2003/2008/2012R2 in AD domain.
If you would like to know more about this role, do drop me a message or you can alternatively drop me an email stated below.
geetali@dhc.com.sg

column3: ICS is an Australian software development company, specialising in enterprise software for organisations involved in the management, measurement and planning of complex data sets and processes.

The ICS Tracker platform is used for the analysis, tracking and management of Natural, Operational and Intellectual assets and their associated cost and maintenance.  Agencies as diverse as Parks Management, Tourism Bodies, Water Utilities and Medical Research Boards better manage their planning and resources with the ICS Tracker platform.

column1:
","

Overview

This position description describes the objectives, duties, responsibilities, relationships and required skills for the role of Developer.

Objective

Participate in the development of ICS system solutions, and provide application support for the solutions.

Duties and Responsibilities 

Duties

  • 1st & 2nd Level help desk support via Phone, Email and face to face meetings.
  • Provide end-user support, out of offices hours may be required on occasional basis.
  • Develop functional specifications to ensure they provide a complete and unambiguous description of the system to be developed.
  • Participate in the creation of ICS web application software, applying company standards, methods and processes for software design and development.
  • Participate in requirement collection activities
  • Prepare estimates for systems design and development tasks.
  • Prepare detailed task breakdowns for systems design and development activities.
  • Contribute to development of company standards, methods and processes for software design and development.
  • Meet Service Level obligations as contracted with the client, e.g. response and resolution times for issues raised by a client.
  • Other duties as directed.

Responsibility

  • Responsible for providing system support to meet Service Level obligations in relation to support as contracted with the client.
  • Responsible for the execution of system design and development tasks assigned to the Developer by the Project Manager.
  • Responsible for assisting in producing logical and physical system design specifications and application software to a level acceptable to all stakeholders.
  • Report accurately to the Project Manager on the progress of system design and development tasks.

Requirement 

Key Knowledge and Skills Required

  • High Proficiency in C#.NET and MS SQL is a MUST
  • High degree of demonstrable knowledge and experience in software design and development, and working within a project team.
  • A comprehensive knowledge of information technology and information systems, together with a good understanding of future trends within the industry.
  • Demonstrated high level strategic and analytical skills and the ability to resolve complex technical and conceptual issues.
  • A high level of interpersonal skills, including written and oral communication.
  • Good Team player
  • Having ArcGIS and Phyton scripting knowledge will be advantageous.

Direction / Supervision Received

The Developer is expected to operate with a degree of day-to-day autonomy, receiving guidance and direction on specific project activities from relevant Project Managers.

Key Relationships / Reporting Structure

  • The Developer will have key relationships with:
  • Business Analyst
  • ICS Project Manager.

Qualifications Required

  • Minimum 4 years of hands-on experience in C#.NET and Microsoft SQL Server 2005/2008
  • Tertiary qualification in information technology or information systems or a related discipline.

Prefer start immediately.

Interested candidates are invited to apply online. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Thank you for applying.

At g&m, we come to work every day because we want to make insurance simple for everyone. Traditional sales methods are complex and inefficient, and yet technology lacks the personal touch, and service. We strive to deliver an exceptional experience through the integration of Technology and service. Our mission is to redefine the delivery of insurance through innovation, creating values with simple solutions for our community.

Why we do it? Because we believe that we can champion change for the better. And also to one day have our brand synonymous with service excellence in the insurance world.

Why it works? Because we have an energetic and dynamic team that embraces the mission of the company. We love the work that we do. g&m is as much our daily battleground, as it is our playground.

","

We are looking for an individual who is passionate about developing impactful digital platforms. He/she will participate in projects that play an important and major role in shaping how our customers interact with us. The projects include customer-facing website and portal to acquire and retain potential and existing customers. The candidate will understand business requirements, and develop the web applications from start to end. He/she needs to be comfortable with both front and back end programming, have strong technical skills and knowledge of back-end systems and APIs. Reports directly to Customer Experience Manager.

A day in the life:

- Create unique digital platforms and services with team members to engage users with valuable experience in the insurance landscape.

- Ownership of technical designs, code development, and component test execution.

- Design and develop front-end architecture for web applications basis on the wireframe and prototypes produced by UI/UX designer.

- Ensuring responsiveness of applications.

- Performing code reviews with security, performance, maintenance and reusability.

- Support issues analysis and fix activities during test phase, as well as production issue resolution.

- Work with designer to ensure quality of output, and participate in continuous user testing.

- Collaborate within a team comprised of diverse and complementary skills.

What you need:

- Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Computer Engineering or an equivalent qualification

- At least 3 years of experience in back-end web development

- Strong proficiency in developing and integrating with back end services using APIs

- Strong proficiency in .NET micro service application architecture

- Strong proficiency in .NET Entity Framework with MS SQL database

- Strong proficiency in NuGet package manager

-  Proficiency with fundamental front end languages including HTML, CSS and JavaScript/Typescript

- Proficiency in any of the frontend developer frameworks such as Angular, React, jQuery, Bootstrap, etc.

- Proficiency with source control tools such as Azure DevOps (formerly known as Team Foundation Server), Github, CVS, SVN, etc

- Proficiency with RESTful API development and tools such as Swagger, Postman, etc.

- Familiarity with API integration with Salesforce platform will be an added advantage.

- Familiarity with any other RDBMS (database connection) such as Ingress, MySQL, Maria SQL, PostgreSQL will be an added advantage

- Familiarity in Agile practice such as Scrum will be an added advantage.

- Familiarity in working with cloud technology such as serverless architecture, containerization, will be an added advantage.

- Familiarity in working with any cloud deployment including Azure or AWS will be an added advantage.

- Familiarity in migrating application from older technology stack such as ASP.NET or VB.NET to latest technology stack such as .NET core will be an added advantage.

- Team player and able to work collaboratively with other members in team.

- Excellent problem-solving skills

- Please provide your portfolio in addition to your resume. It can be attached soft-copy or an URL

Company Background:
The company is an industrial information technology company that provides intelligent information systems.
They have executed numerous projects in process controls, monitoring and data reporting to various process industries.
Our clients are multinationals in the petrochemical, oil & gas, pharmaceutical, food & beverage and general industries.

Job Requirements:

  • A keen interest in Software and Computer Technology is a pre-requisite
  • Must be self -driven and results-oriented with minimum supervision required.
  • Willing to travel overseas when required

column1: 860,software,/en/job/research-engineer-computer-science-engineering-r00005480-9383644,9383644,Research Engineer (Computer Science-Engineering) - R00005480,False,False,,,SGD,Nanyang Technological University,15-Mar-22,False,,30 days,200604393R,,,More than 5000 Employees,,Singapore,"<div>

column3: <div>

column4: About Nanyang Technological University, Singapore

column3: <div>

column4: A research-intensive public university, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (NTU Singapore) has 33,000 undergraduate and postgraduate students in the Engineering, Business, Science, Humanities, Arts, & Social Sciences, and Graduate colleges. It also has a medical school, the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine, established jointly with Imperial College London.

column3: <div>

column4: NTU is also home to world-class autonomous institutes – the National Institute of Education, S Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Earth Observatory of Singapore, and Singapore Centre for Environmental Life Sciences Engineering – and various leading research centres such as the Nanyang Environment & Water Research Institute (NEWRI) and Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N).

column3: <div>

column4: Ranked amongst the world’s top universities by QS, NTU has also been named the world’s top young university for the past seven years. The University’s main campus is frequently listed among the Top 15 most beautiful university campuses in the world and has 57 Green Mark-certified (equivalent to LEED-certified) buildings, of which 95% are certified Green Mark Platinum. Apart from its main campus, NTU also has a campus in Novena, Singapore’s healthcare district.

column3: <div>

column4: Under the NTU Smart Campus vision, the University harnesses the power of digital technology and tech-enabled solutions to support better learning and living experiences, the discovery of new knowledge, and the sustainability of resources.

column3: For more information, visit www.ntu.edu.sg

The IT Engineer is responsible for the design, implementation, and testing of Manufacturing Automation

Roles & Responsibilities

  • Responsible for the development of the MES, CIM platform to ensure quality, security, scalability, and integrity.
  • Provide support and maintenance to the application systems and ensure all issues are proactively resolved.
  • Adhere to, influence, and advocate internal software design & development standards, processes, and best practices such as but not limited to code re-use, scalability, portability, security, and documentation.
  • Ad-hoc assign by management from time to time
  • Participate in the development of IT strategic planning and develop solutions according to IT strategy.
  • Produce documentation and training materials, if needed.

Job Requirements:

  • Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology or Electronic Engineering

Min. Years of Experience:

  1. At least 5 years of development experience in IT application roles in manufacturing & B-B environment or related industry in a semiconductor organization.
  2. Hands on experience in building and implementing Industrial 4.0 concepts such as Manufacturing Computer Integrated Manufacturing, Equipment Automation for Mobile Robots, RFID
  3. Familiarity in manufacturing methodologies such as Lean or 6-sigma is a plus

Skills required:

  2. Have experience in SOAP, RESTful APIs, Microservices, JSON, XML, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, Programming languages such as C++, Java, .Net. etc
  3. Oracle, Microsoft SQL Databases
  4. Data Warehouse, Engineer Data Analytics
  5. Ability to work cross-functionally in matrix organization where internal relationship building and credibility is critical
  6. Creativity and curiosity for unique ways to solve complex user problems.
  7. Demonstrated willingness to both teach others and learn new techniques.
  8. Able to work independently and in a fast-paced environment

863,software,/en/job/svp-platform-architect-digital-platform-group-consumer-banking-%5Bwd17609%5D-9410289,9410289,"SVP , Platform Architect (Digital Platform) Group Consumer Banking - [WD17609]",False,False,,,SGD,DBS Bank Limited,3 hours ago,False,,,196800306E,,,More than 5000 Employees,,,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia, with over 280 branches across 18 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS has a growing presence in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's ""AA-"" and ""Aa1"" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

column1:
","
SVP , Platform Architect (Digital Platform) Group Consumer Banking and Big Data Analytics Technology, Technology and Operations - (WD17609)
Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation.
In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.
In our digital transformation journey ahead, we intend to build loosely coupled but tightly aligned components that are built expecting to be reused while anticipating change.
All of our applications must adopt common services, platforms, architectural principles, and design patterns.
As engineering teams design and build new capabilities & features, they need to begin with an end-state vision of how their applications will operate within this architecture and then, engineer them accordingly.
This sets a common set of parameters and tools for software development and provides a consistent approach to security, maintainability and reliability. In addition, architectural agility has a causal relationship with potential strategic and operational benefits.
The Platform Architect is responsible for enabling the above ambition and driving the design and development of integrated solutions that meet current and future enterprise business strategy.
Responsibilites
  • Provide technical vision, strategy, and execute the long-term architectural direction, with emphasis on platforms/ Product reusable components
  • Develop a deep knowledge of our customers & collaborate with stakeholders to gather business and functional platform requirements and translate requirements into technical specifications and architectures that are robust, scalable and supportable
  • Identify and evaluate alternative design options and trade-offs to handle both functional and non-functional requirements. Recommend designs that consider current applications & architecture, operating models as well as end target state architecture
  • Perform architecture feasibility analysis and make recommendations to senior leadership regarding product architecture options
  • Develop and document architecture specifications that serve as the reference for engineering and execution
  • Responsible for end to end architecture, high- & low-level designs of various systems and applications in line with Singapore & regional strategy. Lead the preparation of detailed design specifications to form the basis for development & modification of applications. Define integration patterns
  • Ensure adoption and implementation of defined solutions. Provide technical expertise to enable the application design & iteration. Collaborates with technical teams to develop and agree system integration plans and review progress
  • Create a platform roadmap to cloud native architecture. Ensure adoption and implementation of roadmap through team work
  • Support change programs/ project through technical plans & application of design principles that comply with enterprise and solution architecture standards
  • Lead governance forums required to create harmony in application architectures
  • Ensure that Extensions and additions to the defined architecture are undertaken frequently in line with every evolving business and technology landscape but go through rigorous vetting processes.
  • Ensure that the collaborative nature of capabilities such as design and engineering is coupled with tight governance around non-negotiables like security, availability and performance.
  • Recruit, develop and grow top technical talent through effective mentoring, coaching, succession planning and retention strategies for key talent in a highly competitive economic environment.
  • Further the culture of product innovation and excellence, characterized as highly collaborative, execution-focused, customer-centric and high velocity
  • Provide clear and consistent leadership, management, and mentoring
Requirements
  • Proven experience as an Architecture leader with overall experience of 15+ years with at least 8+ years in banking industry
  • Demonstrated ability to understand business strategy & processes & its successful translation into technology solutions
  • Hands-on experience with software development and system administration
  • Excellent knowledge of technical architecture and modern design patterns, including microservices, serverless functions etc.
  • Deep End-to-End Architecture understanding, including Enterprise Java Stack, Front-End technologies, mobile applications (Android and iOS), Middleware, Databases (SQL & No SQL), Data Warehouses, RESTful APIs
  • Experienced in streaming technology including frameworks such as Kafka
  • Deep understanding of Enterprise Integration and Messaging Patterns, SOA Governance practices
  • Experienced working in a cloud native work environment, spring cloud data, Spring Security, oAuth, service monitoring on cloud, PaaS environment such as Pivotal
  • Deep understanding in AI technologies (Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, etc.), enterprise software and services
  • Familiar with one or more Architecture Frameworks (e.g. TOGAF etc.)
  • Good understanding of DevOps
  • Experienced in Agile methodology
  • Need to be an exceptional builder of great people
  • Highest standards of Collaboration & Teamwork are critical to this role
  • Strong communication skills & ability to engagement senior management on strategic plans, leading project steering committees and status updates etc.
  • Excellent problem analysis skills. Innovative and creative in developing solutions
  • Ability and willingness to be hands-on, Strong attention to detail
  • Ability to work independently and handle multiple concurrent initiatives
  • Excellent organizational, vendor management, negotiation, and prioritization skills
Apply Now

We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.
",[],Senior Manager,,8 years,"Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree",,Full-Time,,"['Medical', 'Business (e.g. Shirts)']",https://careers.dbs.com/careersection/dbs_professional_hires_career_section/jobdetail.ftl?job=WD17609&tz=GMT%2B08%3A00&tzname=Asia%2FManila,70000,Singapore,sg

The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

column1:
","
SVP , Platform Architect (Digital Platform) Group Consumer Banking and Big Data Analytics Technology, Technology and Operations - (WD17609)
Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation.
In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.
In our digital transformation journey ahead, we intend to build loosely coupled but tightly aligned components that are built expecting to be reused while anticipating change.
All of our applications must adopt common services, platforms, architectural principles, and design patterns.
As engineering teams design and build new capabilities & features, they need to begin with an end-state vision of how their applications will operate within this architecture and then, engineer them accordingly.
This sets a common set of parameters and tools for software development and provides a consistent approach to security, maintainability and reliability. In addition, architectural agility has a causal relationship with potential strategic and operational benefits.
The Platform Architect is responsible for enabling the above ambition and driving the design and development of integrated solutions that meet current and future enterprise business strategy.
Responsibilites
  • Provide technical vision, strategy, and execute the long-term architectural direction, with emphasis on platforms/ Product reusable components
  • Develop a deep knowledge of our customers & collaborate with stakeholders to gather business and functional platform requirements and translate requirements into technical specifications and architectures that are robust, scalable and supportable
  • Identify and evaluate alternative design options and trade-offs to handle both functional and non-functional requirements. Recommend designs that consider current applications & architecture, operating models as well as end target state architecture
  • Perform architecture feasibility analysis and make recommendations to senior leadership regarding product architecture options
  • Develop and document architecture specifications that serve as the reference for engineering and execution
  • Responsible for end to end architecture, high- & low-level designs of various systems and applications in line with Singapore & regional strategy. Lead the preparation of detailed design specifications to form the basis for development & modification of applications. Define integration patterns
  • Ensure adoption and implementation of defined solutions. Provide technical expertise to enable the application design & iteration. Collaborates with technical teams to develop and agree system integration plans and review progress
  • Create a platform roadmap to cloud native architecture. Ensure adoption and implementation of roadmap through team work
  • Support change programs/ project through technical plans & application of design principles that comply with enterprise and solution architecture standards
  • Lead governance forums required to create harmony in application architectures
  • Ensure that Extensions and additions to the defined architecture are undertaken frequently in line with every evolving business and technology landscape but go through rigorous vetting processes.
  • Ensure that the collaborative nature of capabilities such as design and engineering is coupled with tight governance around non-negotiables like security, availability and performance.
  • Recruit, develop and grow top technical talent through effective mentoring, coaching, succession planning and retention strategies for key talent in a highly competitive economic environment.
  • Further the culture of product innovation and excellence, characterized as highly collaborative, execution-focused, customer-centric and high velocity
  • Provide clear and consistent leadership, management, and mentoring
Requirements
  • Proven experience as an Architecture leader with overall experience of 15+ years with at least 8+ years in banking industry
  • Demonstrated ability to understand business strategy & processes & its successful translation into technology solutions
  • Hands-on experience with software development and system administration
  • Excellent knowledge of technical architecture and modern design patterns, including microservices, serverless functions etc.
  • Deep End-to-End Architecture understanding, including Enterprise Java Stack, Front-End technologies, mobile applications (Android and iOS), Middleware, Databases (SQL & No SQL), Data Warehouses, RESTful APIs
  • Experienced in streaming technology including frameworks such as Kafka
  • Deep understanding of Enterprise Integration and Messaging Patterns, SOA Governance practices
  • Experienced working in a cloud native work environment, spring cloud data, Spring Security, oAuth, service monitoring on cloud, PaaS environment such as Pivotal
  • Deep understanding in AI technologies (Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, etc.), enterprise software and services
  • Familiar with one or more Architecture Frameworks (e.g. TOGAF etc.)
  • Good understanding of DevOps
  • Experienced in Agile methodology
  • Need to be an exceptional builder of great people
  • Highest standards of Collaboration & Teamwork are critical to this role
  • Strong communication skills & ability to engagement senior management on strategic plans, leading project steering committees and status updates etc.
  • Excellent problem analysis skills. Innovative and creative in developing solutions
  • Ability and willingness to be hands-on, Strong attention to detail
  • Ability to work independently and handle multiple concurrent initiatives
  • Excellent organizational, vendor management, negotiation, and prioritization skills
Apply Now

We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

Responsibilities

Associate - Core banking Ecosystems (Full Stack Developer)

The full stack developer would be someone with expert level Node, ReactJs, AngularJS Experience. This is a fast-paced position that requires a high degree of energy and ability to focus without compromising quality.

We are looking for a candidate who likes to learn and will continue to grow their technology skills and mentor others. The Role would be involved involved in the following activities.

  • Develop mobile and desktop friendly web and mobile applications using Javascript (ES5, ECMAScript 2015/6/7), HTML, CSS and modern frameworks such as ReactJS and AngularJS ,NextJS with SSR capabilities

  • Optimization of the application for maximum speed and scalability; Implementation of security and data protection

  • Write high-quality, clean, maintainable code using engineering best practices (unit testing, source control, continuous integration, automation, design patterns, etc.)

  • Collaborate with other software engineers and product managers to build new products with web and mobile technologies.

  • Creating and maintaining the CI/CD pipelines on the deployment of the application, where deployment for onPrem servers and private cloud (PCF, Openshift etc.).

  • Good Attitude and should be able to work well as part of team who are situated across multiple regions.

Requirements

  • Minimum 1-2 experience in design and build node application in continuous integration, continuous delivery, pair programming and test-driven development.

  • (Fullstack / Frontend) Hands-on experiences in ES5/6, CSS, and HTML; master at least one frontend framework such as ReactJS and AngularJS.

  • Experience with private cloud (PCF, Openshift etc.).

  • Solid understanding of REST API.

  • In-depth understanding of data structures and algorithms.

  • Excellent working attitude, problem-solving, critical thinking and communication skills.

  • Experience with RDBMS and NOSQL database.

  • Experience on Agile Development Methodologies, JIRA, Confluence, Jenkins & bitbucket.

  • Certification in Nodejs, Reactjs, AngularJS is an added advantage.

  • Proficient working in Nodejs, using the latest SDKs and tools and packaging frameworks.

  • Experience in designing and coding scalable Micro Frontends.

  • Experience on Blue/Green deployment.

  • Good knowledge in banking Finance platform.

Apply Now

We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

ASM Pacific Technology Ltd. was founded in 1975. We are the world's leading supplier of semiconductor assembly and SMT equipment with global presence in more than 30 countries. As a Group that achieved revenue of US$2.25 billion in 2017, ASMPT has 11 manufacturing facilities in China, Hong Kong, Germany, Singapore, Malaysia, The Netherlands and United Kingdom.

Our core businesses are the Back-end Equipment, Materials and SMT Solutions. Our Back-end Equipment Segment and SMT Solutions are number one position in the market while lead frame business is the world’s third biggest supplier. We have 10 R&D centres and more than 1,000 patents on leading edge technologies.
ASMPT has been listed in Hong Kong since 1989.

column3: <div>

column4: About Nanyang Technological University, Singapore

column3: <div>

column4: A research-intensive public university, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (NTU Singapore) has 33,000 undergraduate and postgraduate students in the Engineering, Business, Science, Humanities, Arts, & Social Sciences, and Graduate colleges. It also has a medical school, the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine, established jointly with Imperial College London.

column3: <div>

column4: NTU is also home to world-class autonomous institutes – the National Institute of Education, S Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Earth Observatory of Singapore, and Singapore Centre for Environmental Life Sciences Engineering – and various leading research centres such as the Nanyang Environment & Water Research Institute (NEWRI) and Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N).

column3: <div>

column4: Ranked amongst the world’s top universities by QS, NTU has also been named the world’s top young university for the past seven years. The University’s main campus is frequently listed among the Top 15 most beautiful university campuses in the world and has 57 Green Mark-certified (equivalent to LEED-certified) buildings, of which 95% are certified Green Mark Platinum. Apart from its main campus, NTU also has a campus in Novena, Singapore’s healthcare district.

column3: <div>

column4: Under the NTU Smart Campus vision, the University harnesses the power of digital technology and tech-enabled solutions to support better learning and living experiences, the discovery of new knowledge, and the sustainability of resources.

column3: For more information, visit www.ntu.edu.sg

874,software,/en/job/software-channel-sales-manager-jo-211015-270773-9389185,9389185,Software Channel Sales Manager JO-211015-270773,False,False,,,SGD,RGF Talent Solutions Singapore Pte Ltd,17-Mar-22,False,,,201000217C,,,51 - 200 Employees,,,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: As the global brand of the Recruit Group, RGF, abbreviated from Recruit Global Family, is committed to delivering total human resource solutions of superior quality so individuals and companies of all sizes realize their full potential. We provide a one-stop solution for every talent need, from C-suite and senior business leaders to staff level roles.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
With three service brands, RGF International Recruitment is the leading recruitment service provider in Asia and provides a wide range of recruitment solutions across 18 cities. We deliver strong cross-border recruitment solutions at all levels and across all industries and functions.","

Our Client:

RGF represents an established, stock-listed, and global enterprise software technology firm with rich history and solid presence. The business is expanding globally especially in Asia, where it is a leading provider of information, software, and services for professionals. The business has rich legacy spanning more than 150 years of innovations and solid presence in more than 40 nations.

The Responsibilities:

The role is based in Singapore and is part of the healthcare software solution business unit. This role will report to a Regional Manager who is based in Singapore. We invite a highly experienced Southeast Asia software Channel Sales professional to be part of this global business who is a strategic thinker with exceptional relationship building skills and a high level of energy. Asia is their growth market where they are making investments on.

  • Continuously improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the Channel Partner program in Southeast Asia (VN, PH, MY, ID, TH)
  • Handling the regional Channel program while enforcing compliance and consistency
  • Responsible in recruiting, developing, and pushing Channel Partner to reach their target
  • Managing the procedures on identifying, on-boarding, training, certifying Channel Partners
  • Coordinate with the training team to ensure effective training/certification of our channel partners' sales force - and support ongoing training programs
  • Collaborating with the global sales team, finance, marketing, and sales operations for all activities related to Channel Partners
  • Creating periodic annual strategic business plans on revenue targets for each Channel Partner, whilst enabling their sales teams
  • Assist and manage regional sales opportunities, pipeline, and forecasting of the Channel Partners; be as the trusted advisor through all relationship stages, including in training, following up on leads, and joint sales calls
  • Assist with demand generation programs by developing strategies and executing campaigns together with, and in addition to international sales and marketing objectives
  • Be as the contact point bet ween Channel Partner and the technical support team
  • Assisting in identifying Channel Partner's bottlenecks and challenges, and work together to iron the situation with available resources

The Requirements:

  • Strong track record having recruited, developed and driven Channel Partners (CP)
  • Consistently met or overachieved sales quota through assigned Partners
  • Direct experience working with Channel Partners engaged in reselling products and solution (into healthcare clients is a major plus)
  • Direct experience recruiting, launching, and managing successful relationships with Independent Software Vendors
  • Healthcare Information technology experienced is a bonus, but not essential
  • A demonstrated ability to work collaboratively across functions to develop and execute against stated partner-marketing objectives
  • Strong leadership, time management and interpersonal skills - proven ability to build long-term relationships
  • Ability to develop a strong understanding of customer and partner needs, objectives, and strategy
  • Excellent planning, organization, prioritization, and time management skills
  • Ability to work independently and achieve goals with minimal supervision
  • Experienced, and proficient in using CRM systems such as Salesforce.com
  • Understanding of the international environment and of international-specific business challenges

What's on Offer:

  • Ability to grow professionally within the global business
  • Working for a company with a multinational and matrix working environment
  • Being part of a tech company that makes significant positive difference for the society and the market

Disclaimer: The Company complies with the Tripartite Guidelines on Fair Employment Practices (TGFEP), including the prevailing guidelines on recruitment. All qualified applicants will be considered for the position regardless of their age, race, religion, nationality, marital status, or family responsibilities. A more detailed discussion of the TGFEP is available on the Tripartite Alliance for Fair and Progressive Employment Practices (TAFEP) website at https://www.tal.sg/tafep

876,software,/en/job/senior-devops-engineer-9313782,9313782,Senior DevOps Engineer,False,False,,,SGD,DOCTOR ANYWHERE OPERATIONS PTE. LTD.,10 hours ago,False,,1 day,201827970D,,,51 - 200 Employees,,,"
Doctor Anywhere is a regional tech-led healthcare company headquartered in Singapore. With a strong network of established healthcare providers and experienced doctors, Doctor Anywhere’s digital platform enables users to manage their health easily and effectively through the Doctor Anywhere mobile app. Users can consult a licensed local doctor anytime, anywhere, and get medication delivered to their doorsteps within hours. Medical history, health reports, and other documents are stored in-app for easy access.
Under the DA Network clinics, users also have access to an island-wide panel of general practitioners, specialists, and allied healthcare providers.

Complementing this ecosystem is the DA Marketplace. Users can shop for a wide range of health and wellness products and services, such as nutritional supplements, skincare products, physical therapy sessions, and even book home-based healthcare services – all in one place. Doctor Anywhere now serves more than one million, and growing, users on its online and offline platforms.","

About Doctor Anywhere

Doctor Anywhere (DA) is on a mission to be the largest tech-enabled, omnichannel healthcare provider in Southeast Asia. First launched in Singapore in 2017, DA aims to bridge gaps in the healthcare ecosystem through developing innovative solutions and technologies. In 2021, DA raised SGD$88 million in Series C fundraising (August 2021) and acquired Doctor Raksa, the biggest telemedicine platform in Thailand which further strengthened our foundation for telehealth and healthcare offerings. Today, DA is present in Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, Indonesia and India, serving more than 2.5 million (and growing) users across the region.

At DA, we believe in the value of innovation and collaboration. Grounded in our motto of “Keep Going, Keep Growing”, our team strives towards excellence every day, and values diversity in perspectives brought by every member. Together, we bring quality healthcare to your doorstep!

About the team

The Infrastructure & Security team is the backbone of our platforms and services. Our Infrastructure & Security team is responsible for ensuring day to day operations, supporting and securing our large scale and highly critical applications and availability of our platform and services.

About the role

You will be working closely with engineering teams to design, maintain and build a distributed infrastructure. You have experience in supporting large scale and highly critical applications, automating the deployment, monitoring and scaling of the applications. You will also be working closely with the developers and QAs in investigating and resolving production issues.

Responsibilities

·      Hands-on experience in deploying and maintaining Infrastructure & Apps on AWS and Azure. Good to have knowledge of GCP.

·      Managing day-to-day operations and administer cloud and on-prem infrastructure & security configuration to deliver highly available and scalable services.

·      User access management with RBAC

·      Setup and maintain Infrastructure and Application monitoring based on KPIs and reporting on periodic and ad hoc basis to management

·      Must have experience with Infrastructure and application monitoring tools

·      Must have experience working with AWS device farm

·      Must be familiar with CI-CD tool-chain and have work experience with knowledge of config and administration of tools in the tool-chain

·      Hands-on experience in building automated deployment and config management to minimize manual intervention and to meet security and compliance objectives.

·      Implement and maintain configuration management and infrastructure as code (any one of the tools CloudFormation, Terraform, Ansible/puppet).

·      Must have experience in migrating Infrastructure across AWS and Azure

·      Implement cloud-based Infrastructure for new projects for data analytics, web portals, and mobile applications.

·      Promote a risk-aware culture, ensure efficient and effective risk and compliance management practices by adhering to required standards and processes.

About you

·      Degree or Master’s Degree in Computer Science/ Information Systems with 8+ years of experience in creating secured cloud-based infrastructure

·      Minimum 3 year of hands-on experience on container and orchestration technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, etc)

·      Experience in assessing system architectures and technical feasibility trade-offs

·      Experience with several cloud technologies, preferably in AWS and Azure 

·      Hands-on experience in implementing security solutions from monitoring the infrastructure for threats

·      Experience in using and administering monitoring tools like DataDog, Nagios, NewRelic for Apps and Infra monitoring on cloud

·      Familiarity with systems monitoring, log aggregation, and dashboard solutions

·      Experience in building and operating mission critical, highly available (24×7) systems

·      Adequate knowledge of scripting with Go, Javascript, Python, or similar

·      Understanding of web technologies and knowledge of REST APIs, secure network communication, Node JS, React, Python, SQL and NoSQL

·      Strong written and verbal communication skills.

·      A start-up attitude - you take full ownership of things that you do, willing to go out of your comfort zones and take on new challenges.

·      Comfortable with ambiguity and flexible to learn new things - we’re not done growing, and heading into uncharted territories is part of the fun!

Not for you? We have other opportunities that may interest you or someone you know. Feel free to visit us at our careers page - https://doctoranywhere.com/job-listing/ for more information.
